The historical record provides reason to think that much of the foreign policy establishment can be convinced of the virtues of realism and restraint. The United States, after all, has a rich tradition of elite-level restrainers, as the journalist Stephen Kinzer makes clear in The New Flag, where he describes the great debate that took place between American imperialists and anti-imperialists at the close of the nineteenth century.28 Although the expansionists carried the day, they barely won, and the restrainers remained a formidable presence in debates about American foreign policy throughout the twentieth century. Thus, as Kinzer notes: “Those of us who are trying to push America to a more prudent and restrained foreign policy are standing on the shoulders of titans—great figures of American history who first enunciated the view and to continue to make their argument is something quintessentially American.”29

争取那些未来可能成为外交政策制定者一部分的年轻人的支持至关重要。这应该不难做到，因为这些年轻人对自由主义霸权的认同度不高，因此比他们的长辈更容易接受新思想。

It is also crucial to win over young people who are likely to become part of the foreign policy establishment. That should be possible because those newcomers are not heavily invested in liberal hegemony and thus more likely than their elders to be open to new ideas.

对于那些希望约束美国外交政策的反精英而言，首要任务是建立强大的机构，以此为据点阐述他们的观点。这一信息不仅应面向政界人士和政策制定者，也应面向广大公众。公众尤其重要，因为他们更容易接受克制的论点。大多数美国人更倾向于解决国内问题，而不是发动无休止的战争并试图掌控世界。与外交政策建制派不同，他们对自由主义霸权并不十分认同，因此应该有可能说服他们中的许多人放弃这种立场。公众对自由主义霸权不满的最佳例证是，过去三位美国总统都是通过反对自由主义霸权而当选的。希拉里·克林顿则在2008年和2016年两次全力捍卫自由主义霸权，但两次都败北，第一次输给了奥巴马，第二次输给了特朗普。

The first order of business for the counter-elite hoping to rein in American foreign policy is to build formidable institutions from which they can make the case. This message should be aimed at the broader public as well as politicians and policymakers. The public is an especially important target because it is likely to be receptive to arguments for restraint. Most Americans prefer to address problems at home rather than fight endless wars and try to run the world. Unlike the foreign policy establishment, they are not deeply committed to liberal hegemony, so it should be possible to persuade many of them to abandon it. The best evidence of the public’s dissatisfaction with liberal hegemony is that the last three U.S. presidents all gained the office by campaigning against it.30 Hillary Clinton, on the other hand, defended liberal hegemony to the hilt in 2008 and again in 2016 and lost both times, first to Obama and then to Trump.

克制派应该强调的核心信息是：自由主义霸权并不符合评估任何外交政策的首要标准：它不符合美国的国家利益。换句话说，推行现实主义外交政策需要诉诸民族主义，这意味着要让美国民众认真思考什么才是对他们自身及其同胞最有利的。这并非呼吁采取妖魔化其他群体和国家的强硬民族主义。相反，重点在于推行几乎完全基于一个标准的政策：什么对美国人民最有利？为了阐明他们的观点，克制派应该强调三点。首先，美国是有史以来最安全的大国，因此无需干涉地球上每个国家的政治。它是西半球的霸主，并且与历史上其他大国所在的东亚和欧洲地区隔着两条巨大的护城河——大西洋。还有太平洋。它拥有数千枚核武器，而且在我们讨论的情景中，它是国际体系中唯一的超级大国。

The central message that restrainers should drive home is that liberal hegemony does not satisfy the principal criterion for assessing any foreign policy: it is not in America’s national interest. In other words, selling a realist foreign policy requires an appeal to nationalism, which means asking Americans to think hard about what makes the most sense for them and their fellow citizens. This is not a call for adopting a hard-edged nationalism that demonizes other groups and countries. The emphasis instead is on pursuing policies based almost exclusively on one criterion: what is best for the American people? To make their case, restrainers should emphasize three points. First, the United States is the most secure great power in recorded history and thus does not need to interfere in the politics of every country on the planet. It is a hegemon in the Western Hemisphere, and it is separated from East Asia and Europe—the regions where other great powers have historically been located—by two giant moats, the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans. It has thousands of nuclear weapons, and in the scenario we are considering here, it is the only great power in the international system.

其次，自由主义霸权根本行不通。它尝试了二十五年，留下的却是徒劳的战争、失败的外交和声望的下降。

Second, liberal hegemony simply does not work. It was tried for twenty-five years and left a legacy of futile wars, failed diplomacy, and diminished prestige.

最后，自由主义霸权给美国人民带来了巨大的代价，包括生命和金钱上的损失。阿富汗和伊拉克持续不断的战争预计将耗资超过5万亿美元。 31 如果我们执意要让美国巨额国债增加这么多，这些钱本可以更好地用于教育、公共卫生、交通基础设施和科学研究等领域，这些领域的额外投资本可以使美国成为一个更加繁荣、更加宜居的国家。然而，自由主义霸权最大的代价或许在于其他方面：它对美国政治和社会结构的破坏。在一个沉迷于战争的国家，个人权利和法治将难以维系。

Finally, liberal hegemony involves significant costs for the American people, in both lives and money. The ongoing wars in Afghanistan and Iraq are expected to cost more than $5 trillion.31 Surely if we were intent on adding that much to America’s huge national debt, the money could have been better spent on education, public health, transportation infrastructure, and scientific research, just to name a few areas where additional investment would have made the United States a more prosperous and livable country. Perhaps the greatest cost of liberal hegemony, however, is something else: the damage it does to the American political and social fabric. Individual rights and the rule of law will not fare well in a country addicted to fighting wars.

反对者肯定会遇到这样的论点：诉诸美国民族主义是自私的，像美国这样的强国拥有资源和责任去帮助世界各地身处困境的人们。如果自由主义霸权真如宣传的那样奏效，这种论点或许有道理。但事实并非如此。冷战后时期，为华盛顿失败政策付出最大代价的，是那些不幸生活在被美国决策者列为政权更迭目标的国家的外国人。看看如今的大中东地区就知道了，美国奉行自由主义霸权，却将其变成了一片巨大的灾难区。如果美国人想要促进民主在全球的传播，最好的方法就是集中精力在国内建立一个充满活力的民主制度，让其他国家愿意效仿。

Restrainers will surely encounter the argument that appealing to American nationalism is selfish and that a powerful country like the United States has the resources and the responsibility to help people in trouble around the world. This argument might make sense if liberal hegemony worked as advertised. But it does not. The people who have paid the greatest cost for Washington’s failed policies in the post–Cold War period are foreigners who had the misfortune of living in countries that American policymakers targeted for regime change. Just look at the greater Middle East today, which the United States, pursuing liberal hegemony, has helped turn into a giant disaster zone. If Americans want to facilitate the spread of democracy around the world, the best way to achieve that goal is to concentrate on building a vibrant democracy at home that other states will want to emulate.

基于现实主义的外交政策的理由简单明了、掷地有声，应该能够说服绝大多数美国人。但它仍然难以推行，主要是因为许多外交政策精英深信自由主义霸权，并且会不惜一切代价捍卫它。当然，终结自由主义霸权的最佳途径是……中国将继续崛起，从而终结单极世界格局，使这个问题变得毫无意义。但这样一来，美国就不得不与一个潜在的势均力敌的对手展开竞争，这是任何大国都不愿面对的局面。尽管维持单极世界格局会诱使美国决策者坚持自由主义霸权，但这仍然是更可取的选择。为了避免这种情况发生，美国人必须认识到自由主义外交政策的危险性以及克制的重要性。我希望这本书能对此有所帮助。

The case for a realist-based foreign policy is straightforward and powerful, and it should be compelling to a large majority of Americans. But it is still a tough sell, mainly because many in the foreign policy elite are deeply committed to liberal hegemony and will go to enormous lengths to defend it. Of course, the best way to put an end to liberal hegemony would be for China to continue rising, thus ending unipolarity and making the question moot. But then the United States would have to compete with a potential peer competitor, a situation no great power wants to face. It would be preferable to retain the unipolar world, even though it would tempt American policymakers to stick with liberal hegemony. For that not to happen, Americans must understand the dangers of a liberal foreign policy and the virtues of restraint. I hope this book will help that cause.

笔记

NOTES

第一章 不可能的梦想

Chapter 1. The Impossible Dream

1.在美国日常话语中，区分自由派和保守派是司空见惯的。自由派通常与民主党联系在一起，而保守派则与共和党联系在一起。鉴于这种区分，将美国描述为一个彻头彻尾的自由主义国家似乎意义不大。然而，我在这里使用“自由主义”一词，是按照路易斯·哈茨所说的“经典洛克式意义”来理解的，这使得我和他都能说，美国的核心是自由主义的，尽管民主党和共和党之间存在着重要的差异，但本质上，它们都是自由主义的机构。路易斯·哈茨，《美国的自由主义传统：美国革命以来政治思想的诠释》（纽约：哈考特·布雷斯出版社，1955年），第4页。

1. It is commonplace in everyday American discourse to distinguish between liberals and conservatives. Liberals are usually identified with the Democratic Party, while conservatives are identified with the Republican Party. Given that distinction, it would make little sense to describe the United States as a deeply liberal country. I am using the term liberal, however, in what Louis Hartz called the “classic Lockean sense,” which allows him and me to say that America is liberal at its core, and that although there are important differences between the Democratic and Republican Parties, in essence, they are both liberal institutions. Louis Hartz, The Liberal Tradition in America: An Interpretation of American Political Thought since the Revolution (New York: Harcourt Brace, 1955), p. 4.

2.正如托尼·史密斯在其著作《美国的使命：美国与二十世纪全球民主斗争》（普林斯顿，新泽西州：普林斯顿大学出版社，1994年）中所阐述的那样，整个二十世纪，美国都在积极地在海外推广民主。然而，直到冷战结束，传播自由民主始终让位于基于强权政治的强硬政策，这些政策有时甚至涉及推翻民选领导人，以及与残暴的独裁者保持密切关系。换言之，直到1989年，美国才具备了推行自由主义霸权的条件。

2. The United States actively promoted democracy abroad throughout the twentieth century, as Tony Smith makes clear in America’s Mission: The United States and the Worldwide Struggle for Democracy in the Twentieth Century (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1994). Until the Cold War ended, however, spreading liberal democracy always took a backseat to hard-nosed policies based on power politics, which sometimes involved overthrowing democratically elected leaders and having cozy relations with brutal autocrats. The United States, in other words, was not in a position to adopt liberal hegemony until 1989.

3. Francis Fukuyama，“历史的终结？”，《国家利益》 ，第 16 期（1989 年夏季），第 3-18 页。另见 Francis Fukuyama，《历史的终结与最后的人》（纽约：自由出版社，1992 年）。

3. Francis Fukuyama, “The End of History?,” National Interest, no. 16 (Summer 1989), pp. 3–18. Also see Francis Fukuyama, The End of History and the Last Man (New York: Free Press, 1992).

4.《1992 年竞选；克林顿关于美国角色的演讲摘录》，《纽约时报》 ，1992 年 10 月 2 日。

5. “总统讨论伊拉克的未来”，华盛顿特区希尔顿酒店，2003 年 2 月 26 日。有关白宫的文字记录，请参阅https:// georgewb​​ush-whitehouse.archives.gov/news/releases/2003/02/print/20030226-11.html 。

7.约翰·洛克，《政府论（下篇）》，托马斯·P·皮尔顿编（印第安纳波利斯：鲍勃斯-梅里尔出版社，1952年），第4页。另见福山，《历史的终结与最后的人》，第138-139页；约翰·罗尔斯，《万民法：附“公共理性观念再探”》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1999年），第12-13、17、19页。正如艾伦·瑞安所指出的，“将政治建立在大多数人认为难以置信的人性观之上，就好比将政治建立在流沙之上。”艾伦·瑞安，《现代自由主义的形成》（新泽西州普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，2012年），第26页。

7. John Locke, The Second Treatise of Government, ed. Thomas P. Peardon (Indianapolis: Bobbs-Merrill, 1952), p. 4. Also see Fukuyama, The End of History and the Last Man, pp. 138–39; John Rawls, The Law of Peoples: With “The Idea of Public Reason Revisited” (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1999), pp. 12–13, 17, 19. As Alan Ryan notes, “To found one’s politics on a view of human nature that most people find implausible is to found one’s politics on quicksand.” Alan Ryan, The Making of Modern Liberalism (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2012), p. 26.

8.鉴于我曾撰写过一部关于现实主义的理论著作—— 《大国政治的悲剧》（修订版，纽约：诺顿出版社，2014年）——人们或许会好奇《大错特错》与《大国政治的悲剧》有何关联。它们在两个方面互为补充。首先，《大错特错》对自由主义着墨甚少，对民族主义更是几乎只字未提。其重点在于发展和检验现实主义理论。然而，现实主义与这两种“主义”的关系有助于我们更全面地理解国际体系的运作方式。此外，这本新书也提供了一个契机，让我能够更深入地探讨现实主义的根源。《大错特错》中并未讨论人性，而人性却是《大错特错》的核心主题。深入挖掘并审视人性，有望揭示支撑现实主义的一些关键假设。

8. Given that I have written a theoretical tract on realism—The Tragedy of Great Power Politics, updated ed. (New York: Norton, 2014)—one might wonder how The Great Delusion relates to Tragedy. They complement each other in two ways. For starters, little attention is paid to liberalism and hardly any attention is paid to nationalism in Tragedy. The focus is instead on developing and testing a theory of realism. Nevertheless, how realism relates to these other two isms helps provide a fuller understanding of how the international system works. Furthermore, this new book presents an opportunity to say more about the roots of realism. There is no discussion of human nature in Tragedy, whereas it is a central part of the story in The Great Delusion. Digging a level deeper and examining human nature will hopefully shed light on some of the key assumptions that underpin realism.

9.本书的核心是三种主义——自由主义、民族主义和现实主义——它们既被视为政治意识形态，也被视为政治理论，因为它们都恰好契合于这两个相互重叠的范畴。在我看来，理论是对现实的简化描述，试图解释世界在特定领域是如何运作的。理论依赖于相互关联的概念或变量，讲述一个导致特定结果的因果故事。理论本质上是解释性的。参见约翰·J·米尔斯海默和斯蒂芬·M·沃尔特合著的《抛开理论：为什么简单的假设检验对国际关系不利》，载于《欧洲国际关系杂志》第19卷第3期（2013年9月），第427-457页。另一方面，政治意识形态是一套系统的概念和原则，它解释了特定社会或更广泛意义上的国际体系应该如何运作。换句话说，它是规范性的；它为政治秩序的运作方式提供了蓝图。意识形态本质上具有规范性，尽管每一种意识形态背后都有其理论支撑，这在很大程度上解释了这两个概念之间存在的显著重叠。因此，意识形态或许可以被称为规范性理论，而非解释性理论。

9. The three isms that are at the center of this book—liberalism, nationalism, and realism—are treated as both political ideologies and theories, as they all fit squarely into these two overlapping categories. For me, a theory is a simplified picture of reality that attempts to explain how the world actually works in particular domains. A theory relies on concepts or variables that are tied together to tell a causal story that leads to a specific outcome. Theories are explanatory in nature. See John J. Mearsheimer and Stephen M. Walt, “Leaving Theory Behind: Why Simplistic Hypothesis Testing Is Bad for International Relations,” European Journal of International Relations 19, no. 3 (September 2013): 427–57. A political ideology, on the other hand, is a systematic body of concepts and principles that explain how a particular society, or the international system more generally, should work. In other words, it is prescriptive; it provides a blueprint for how a political order should operate. Ideologies are inherently normative in nature, although every ideology has theory behind it, which explains in good part the significant overlap between these two concepts. Ideology, for that reason, might be called normative theory, as opposed to explanatory theory.

10. Samuel Moyn，《最后的乌托邦：人权史》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，2010 年），第 1 页。John Gray 在对 Moyn 的著作进行评论时提到了“当代人权崇拜”。参见 Gray，“罗尔斯的遗产”，《国家利益》 ，第 111 期（2011 年 1 月/2 月），第 81 页。

10. Samuel Moyn, The Last Utopia: Human Rights in History (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 2010), p. 1. In his review of Moyn’s book, John Gray refers to “the contemporary cult of human rights.” See Gray, “What Rawls Hath Wrought,” National Interest, no. 111 (January/February 2011), p. 81.

11.这两种自由主义——权宜之计式自由主义和进步主义自由主义——都是理想类型，因此大多数自由主义理论家的著作并不能完全归入其中任何一种，尽管有些著作确实如此。例如，约翰·洛克显然是一位权宜之计式自由主义者，而约翰·罗尔斯则完全符合进步主义自由主义的范畴。无论如何，我的主要关注点并非根据某种思想流派对特定的自由主义学者进行分类，而是理解自由主义内部的主要分歧，以及这些分歧如何与国内外政治相关联。此外，我对这两种政治自由主义的区分并非新颖之见。事实上，我从其他学者的著作中获益良多，他们也采用了类似的二分法，尽管他们使用的名称略有不同，对每种自由主义的内容也提出了略有不同的论点。例如，约翰·格雷在其著作《自由主义的两副面孔》中区分了“权宜之计式自由主义”和“自由主义法律主义” ，而艾伦·瑞安则对比了“古典自由主义”和“现代自由主义”。朱迪思·什克拉因其关于“恐惧的自由主义”的著述而闻名，她也论述了“法律主义”，这与进步自由主义类似。参见约翰·格雷，《自由主义的两副面孔》 （纽约：新出版社，2000年）；瑞安，《现代自由主义的形成》，第一章；朱迪思·什克拉，《政治思想与政治思想家》，斯坦利·霍夫曼编（芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，1998年），第一章。

11. These two kinds of liberalism—modus vivendi and progressive—are ideal types, and thus the writings of most liberal theorists do not fit perfectly into one category or the other, although some do. John Locke, for example, is clearly a modus vivendi liberal, while John Rawls fits squarely in the progressive liberal category. Regardless, my main concern is not to categorize particular liberal scholars according to one school of thought or the other, but instead to understand the main dividing lines within liberalism and how they relate to politics at home and abroad. Furthermore, my distinction between these two types of political liberalism is not novel. In fact, I have learned much from reading the works of other scholars who employ a similar dichotomy, although they use somewhat different names and make somewhat different arguments about the content of each kind of liberalism. John Gray, for example, distinguishes between “modus vivendi liberalism” and “liberal legalism” in his aptly titled book The Two Faces of Liberalism, while Alan Ryan contrasts “classical liberalism” with “modern liberalism.” Judith Shklar, who is well known for her writings about the “liberalism of fear,” also writes about “legalism,” which is akin to progressive liberalism. John Gray, The Two Faces of Liberalism (New York: New Press, 2000); Ryan, The Making of Modern Liberalism, chap. 1; Judith N. Shklar, Political Thought and Political Thinkers, ed. Stanley Hoffmann (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1998), chap. 1.

Antony 编，《没有神的哲学家：关于无神论和世俗生活的沉思》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2007 年），第 x、xii 页。这种对客观真理的乐观观点也清楚地反映在 JL Mackie 的《伦理学：发明对与错》（伦敦：企鹅出版社，1990 年）中，尽管 Mackie 本人反对这种观点。

Also consider Louise Antony’s comment in the introduction to a book of essays by “twenty leading philosophers from Great Britain and the United States, all of whom abjure traditional religious faith.” Noting that atheists are routinely said to have “no moral values,” she notes, “The essays in this volume should serve to roundly refute this. Every writer in this volume adamantly affirms the objectivity of right and wrong.” Louise M. Antony, ed., Philosophers without Gods: Meditations on Atheism and the Secular Life (New York: Oxford University Press, 2007), pp. x, xii. This optimistic perspective on objective truth is also clearly reflected in J. L. Mackie, Ethics: Inventing Right and Wrong (London: Penguin Books, 1990), although Mackie himself argues against it.

9.有人可能会认为，关于何为美好生活的核心问题，存在绝对真理，但我们的批判能力不足以帮助我们辨别这些真理。然而，这种论点与我关于我们批判能力局限性的论断是一致的。

31.丹尼尔·卡尼曼认为，影响我们思维方式的两个系统是：系统1，它涉及快速思考，主要依赖直觉；以及系统2，它的思考速度较慢，依赖于严谨的推理。参见卡尼曼，《思考，快与慢》（纽约：法拉尔、斯特劳斯和吉鲁出版社，2011年），尤其是第一部分。另见理查德·H·泰勒和卡斯·R·桑斯坦，《助推：改善关于健康、财富和幸福的决策》（修订版，纽约：企鹅出版社，2009年），该书区分了自动系统和反思系统。心理学文献中广泛反映了这两种认知过程之间的区别。

31. Daniel Kahneman maintains that there are two systems that influence the way we think: System 1, which involves fast thinking and relies mainly on intuition; and System 2, where thinking is slower and relies on careful reasoning. Kahneman, Thinking Fast and Slow (New York: Farrar, Straus and Giroux, 2011), especially part I. Also see Richard H. Thaler and Cass R. Sunstein, Nudge: Improving Decisions about Health, Wealth, and Happiness, rev. ed. (New York: Penguin, 2009), which distinguishes between the Automatic and Reflective Systems. This distinction between these two cognitive processes is widely reflected in the psychology literature.

33.例如，海特写道：“社会直觉主义模型的核心论点是，道德判断是由快速的道德直觉引起的，随后（在需要时）才会进行缓慢的、事后道德推理。”（海特，《情感之犬及其理性之尾》，第817页）一些学者认为，我们的批判能力随着时间的推移而进化，并非为了帮助我们发现真理和做出明智的决定，而是为了帮助我们在与他人的辩论中获胜。参见帕特里夏·科恩，《理性更多地被视为武器而非通往真理的道路》，《纽约时报》，2011年6月14日；雨果·梅西耶和丹·斯珀伯，《人类为何进行推理？论证理论的论据》，《行为与脑科学》 34卷2期（2011年4月）：57-74页。

40.自由主义者和其他强调个人主义、淡化社会或社群重要性的人通常承认，在自然状态下，人类不可能成为原子式的个体，每个人都必须在社会中由他人抚养长大。然而，他们认为这种人为构建的理论框架是思考人类境况的有效工具。尽管这种方法有其优点，但其最大的缺陷在于，它忽略了人类的社会性——而这对于理解世界如何运作至关重要。参见 Jean Hampton，“契约与同意”，载于Robert E. Goodin 和 Philip Pettit 编， 《当代政治哲学指南》（马尔登，马萨诸塞州：布莱克威尔出版社，2007 年），第 379-382 页。

40. Liberals and others who emphasize individualism and downplay the importance of society or community usually concede that humans could never have been atomistic individuals in the state of nature, and that everyone had to be raised by others in a society. Nevertheless, they believe this invented story is a useful theoretical device for thinking about the human condition. While this approach has its virtues, its great flaw is that the social nature of humans, which is so important for understanding how the world works, gets left on the cutting room floor. Jean Hampton, “Contract and Consent,” in A Companion to Contemporary Political Philosophy, ed. Robert E. Goodin and Philip Pettit (Malden, MA: Blackwell, 2007), pp. 379–82.

49.法治有时与自由民主政体联系在一起。然而，所有社会都需要一套规则体系才能有效运作。即使是纳粹德国也拥有一套完善的规则体系，但这并不意味着这些规则是公正的。参见 Alan E. Steinweis 和 Robert D. Rachlin 主编的《纳粹德国的法律：意识形态、机会主义与司法的扭曲》（纽约：Berghahn 出版社，2013 年）；Michael Stolleis 和 Thomas Dunlap 主编的《卐字统治下的法律：纳粹德国法律史研究》（芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，1998 年）。

49. Rule of law is a concept that is sometimes associated with liberal democracies. All societies, however, require a system of rules to function effectively. Rachlin, eds., The Law in Nazi Germany: Ideology, Opportunism, and the Perversion of Justice (New York: Berghahn, 2013); Michael Stolleis and Thomas Dunlap, eds., The Law under the Swastika: Studies on Legal History under Nazi Germany (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1998).

50.在我的论述中，无政府状态并非指混乱或无序，而是一种秩序原则，它表明社会或政治体系中不存在任何更高权威。等级制度则意味着存在一个凌驾于一切之上的权威。参见肯尼斯·N·沃尔兹，《国际政治理论》（马萨诸塞州雷丁：艾迪生-韦斯利出版社，1979年），第102-116页。

With hierarchy, there is an overarching authority. See Kenneth N. Waltz, Theory of International Politics (Reading, MA: Addison-Wesley, 1979), pp. 102–16.

58.这一基本生活事实是《君主论》的核心主题。马基雅维利致力于寻找一位能够统一意大利各城邦、使意大利成为足以对抗奥地利和法国的强国的杰出君主。奥地利和法国经常干涉意大利政治，有时甚至诉诸武力。为了实现这一目标，一个城邦的君主必须征服并征服其他意大利城邦。马基雅维利深知，赢得战败对手的支持将是一项极其艰巨的任务。例如，他写道：“但是，当一个人征服一个语言、习俗和秩序迥异的省份时，困难就出现了，这时就需要极大的运气和勤奋才能守住它们。”（尼科洛·马基雅维利，《君主论》，哈维·C·曼斯菲尔德译，第二版，芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，1998年，第9-10页）不出所料，这本经典著作充满了马基雅维利关于君主应如何应对敌对民众和统治者的建议。尽管马基雅维利于1513年写下《君主论》，但意大利直到1870年才完全统一。

58. This basic fact of life is a core theme in The Prince. Machiavelli was deeply committed to finding a talented prince who could unite Italy’s various city-states and turn Italy into a great power that could stand up to Austria and France, which frequently interfered, sometimes militarily, in Italian politics. To achieve this goal, the prince of one city-state would have to conquer and subdue the other Italian city-states. Machiavelli was fully aware that winning over defeated rivals would be an especially difficult task. He writes, for example, “But when one acquires states in a province disparate in language, customs, and orders, here are the difficulties, and here one needs to have great fortune and great industry to hold them.” Niccolò Machiavelli, The Prince, trans. Harvey C. Mansfield, 2nd ed. (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1998), pp. 9–10. Not surprisingly, this classic book is filled with advice from Machiavelli about how the prince should deal with resistance from hostile populations and leaders. Although Machiavelli wrote The Prince in 1513, Italy was not fully unified until 1870.

59.一项关于美国新教教派分裂原因的研究发现，“分裂的最有力单一预测因素是教派规模，以……衡量”。教派成员：教派越大，分裂的倾向就越大。”罗伯特·C·利布曼、约翰·R·萨顿和罗伯特·伍斯诺，《探索教派主义的社会根源：1890-1980年美国新教教派的分裂》，《美国社会学评论》 53，第3期（1988年6月）：343-52。另见詹姆斯·R·刘易斯和莎拉·M·刘易斯编，《神圣的分裂：宗教如何分裂》（纽约：剑桥大学出版社，2009年）。

Liebman, John R. 第三章 政治自由主义

Chapter 3. Political Liberalism

1.约翰·洛克，《政府论》第二篇，托马斯·P·皮尔顿编辑（印第安纳波利斯：鲍勃斯-梅里尔，1952 年），第 4 页。

1. John Locke, The Second Treatise of Government, ed. Thomas P. Peardon (Indianapolis: Bobbs-Merrill, 1952), p. 4.

2. Alexis de Tocqueville，《旧制度与法国大革命》，Gerald Bevan 译注（纽约：企鹅出版社，2008 年），第 102 页。

3. Sanford A. Lakoff, Equality in Political Philosophy (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1964).

4.霍布斯并非自由主义者，原因有二。首先，他几乎不关注自然权利，而自然权利正是自由主义的核心。其次，他主张建立一个权力极大的国家，这与自由主义关于尽可能限制国家权力的思想背道而驰。

4. Hobbes is not a liberal for two reasons. First, he pays hardly any attention to natural rights, which are at the heart of liberalism. Second, he calls for an especially powerful state, which runs counter to liberal thinking about the need to limit state power as much as possible.

5.洛克，《政府论》下篇，第 56 页。另见第 11-14 页、第 70-73 页。

5. Locke, The Second Treatise of Government, p. 56. Also see pp. 11–14, 70–73.

6.艾伦·瑞安指出：“对宽容作为一种权利的倡导或否定，比任何其他因素都更能尖锐地划分自由主义者和非自由主义者。” 瑞安，《现代自由主义的形成》（普林斯顿，新泽西州：普林斯顿大学出版社，2012年），第31页。另见第22-23页。

6. Alan Ryan notes: “The advocacy or denial of toleration as a matter of right divides the liberal and non-liberal more sharply than anything else.” Ryan, The Making of Modern Liberalism (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2012), p. 31. Also see pp. 22–23.

12.潘恩的完整引文是：“社会在任何状态下都是一种福祉，但政府，即使在最好的状态下，也只是一种必要的恶；在最坏的状态下，则是一种不可容忍的恶。”托马斯·潘恩，《常识》，艾萨克·克拉姆尼克编辑（伦敦：企鹅出版社，1986 年），第 61 页。

36.斯蒂芬·霍姆斯，《密涅瓦的怒容》，《新共和》，1992年3月23日，第28页。德沃金和品克有时也会对他们关于理性能将我们引向何方的大胆论断有所保留，尽管不像福山那样强烈。例如，德沃金承认，他对理性力量的乐观观点在律师中显然属于少数派，这削弱了他关于理性能够引导律师和法官在疑难案件中就“正确答案”达成共识的论断。用德沃金自己的话说，“如果律师和法官对法律是什么存在分歧，而且双方都没有确凿的论据，那么坚持认为一种观点是正确的而其他观点是错误的又有什么意义呢？”德沃金，《原则问题》，第3页。当然，答案是这样做毫无意义。至于品克，尽管他强调“理性的阶梯”，但他明确表示，暴力事件的持续减少并非必然。例如，他写道：“诚然，暴力的衰落并非一帆风顺；它并未将暴力降至零；而且也无法保证这种衰落会持续下去。”此外，他毫不含糊地强调人类仍然具有高度攻击性，并写道：“我们大多数人——包括亲爱的读者您——天生就具有暴力倾向。”他进一步指出，仍然存在一种强大的战略逻辑在起作用——他称之为“和平主义者的困境”——这可能是冲突的重要根源。因此，他总结道：“贪婪、恐惧、支配欲和欲望等动机不断地驱使我们走向侵略。”当然，他希望我们人性中善良的一面能够继续战胜阴暗的一面，但他承认，这并不能保证未来一定会发生。平克，《善良的天使》，第21、483、678-80、695页。

36. Stephen Holmes, “The Scowl of Minerva,” New Republic, March 23, 1992, p. 28. Dworkin and Pinker also sometimes pull back from their bold claims about where reason can take us, although not as emphatically as Fukuyama. Dworkin, for example, concedes that his optimistic views on the power of reason are clearly in the minority among lawyers, which undermines his claim that reason can lead lawyers and judges to a consensus regarding “right answers” in hard cases. To put the matter in Dworkin’s own words, “If lawyers and judges disagree about what the law is, and no one has a knockdown argument either way, then what sense does it make to insist that one opinion is right and others are wrong?” Dworkin, A Matter of Principle, p. 3. Of course, the answer is that it makes little sense. Regarding Pinker, despite his emphasis on the “escalator of reason,” he makes it clear that a continuing decline in violence is not inevitable. For example, he writes: “The decline, to be sure, has not been smooth; it has not brought violence down to zero; and it is not guaranteed to continue.” Moreover, he minces no words in stressing that human beings remain highly aggressive, writing that “most of us—including you, dear reader—are wired for violence.” He further notes that there is still a powerful strategic logic at play—he calls it the Pacifist’s Dilemma—that is potentially an important cause of conflict. Thus, he concludes: “Motives like greed, fear, dominance, and lust keep drawing us toward aggression.” His hope, of course, is that the better angels of our nature will continue to trump the darker side of our nature, but he acknowledges that there is no guarantee that will happen in the future. Pinker, Better Angels, pp. xxi, 483, 678–80, 695.

63.自由党，《2016年纲领》，2016年5月通过，https://www.lp.org/platform/。自由党对“个人主权”的强调表明，该党对国家抱有深深的怀疑，甚至敌视。主权意味着谁拥有最高权力，这意味着如果个人“对自己的生活拥有主权”，那么个人就拥有批准或否决国家每一项决定的最终权力。根据定义，这种情况实际上使得建立一个能够有效治理这些个人的主权国家几乎是不可能的。玛丽亚·格林伯格，《不可分割的主权：权力委托与退出选择》（未发表论文，芝加哥大学，2017年4月24日）。

63. Libertarian Party, “2016 Platform,” adopted May 2016, https://www.lp.org/platform/. The Libertarian Party’s emphasis on “individual sovereignty” illustrates how deeply suspicious, if not hostile to, it is of the state. Sovereignty connotes who has supreme authority, which means that if individuals were “sovereign over their own lives,” those individuals would have the ultimate authority to approve or disapprove every decision the state made. This situation would make it virtually impossible, by definition, to have a sovereign state that could effectively govern those individuals. Mariya Grinberg, “Indivisible Sovereignty: Delegation of Authority and Exit Option” (unpublished paper, University of Chicago, April 24, 2017).

84.国际关系文献中存在一种功利主义理论，通常被称为谈判理论。参见詹姆斯·费伦（James Fearon）的《战争的理性主义解释》（“Rationalist Explanations for War”），载《国际组织》（International Organization）第49卷第3期（1995年夏季），第379-414页；丹·雷特（Dan Reiter）的《探索战争的谈判模式》（“Exploring the Bargaining Model of War”），载《政治视角》（ Perspectives on Politics）第1卷第1期（2003年3月），第27-43页；以及托马斯·C·谢林（Thomas C. Schelling）的《冲突的战略》（The Strategy of Conflict）（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1960年），第2-3章。该理论的出发点是，战争是一种低效且代价高昂的解决争端的方式，因此，各国通过谈判达成协议以和平方式解决分歧，而不是在战场上交战，显然是明智之举。谈判理论家认为，有三个因素决定了敌对国家达成协议而非相互开战的可能性。必须存在“议题可分割性”，这实际上意味着双方的分歧必须能够通过妥协来解决。双方都必须愿意在交易中放弃一些对他们而言重要的东西。此外，双方都必须充分了解彼此之间的实际力量平衡，以便在冲突爆发时知道谁会获胜。最后，双方都必须能够切实履行已达成的协议。每一方都需要确信对方不会违背协议。这里并非评估谈判理论的地方，因为像所有理论一样，谈判理论也有其优点和缺点。关键在于，谈判理论与功利主义一样，并非自由主义理论，因此它不在本书的讨论范围之内。

84. There is a utilitarian theory in the international relations literature that is commonly referred to as bargaining theory. See James Fearon, “Rationalist Explanations for War,” International Organization 49, no. 3 (Summer 1995): 379–414; Dan Reiter, “Exploring the Bargaining Model of War,” Perspectives on Politics 1, no. 1 (March 2003): 27–43; Thomas C. Schelling, The Strategy of Conflict (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1960), chaps. 2–3. This literature starts with the observation that war is an inefficient and costly way of settling disputes, and therefore it makes eminently good sense for states to settle their disagreements peacefully by negotiating a deal rather than fighting it out on the battlefield. Bargaining theorists maintain that three factors determine the likelihood that rival states will strike a deal rather than fight with each other. There must be “issue divisibility,” which effectively means the differences between the two sides must be amenable to compromise. Both parties must be willing to give up something important to them in the bargain. Furthermore, each side must have a good understanding of the actual balance of power between them, so they know who will prevail if fighting breaks out. Finally, both actors must be able to credibly commit to the agreed bargain. Each side needs to be confident the other side will not welch on the deal. This is not the place to evaluate bargaining theory, which, like all theories, has pluses and minuses. The key point is that bargaining theory, like utilitarianism, is not a liberal theory, and thus it falls outside the scope of this book.

It is worth noting that the communitarian critique of Rawlsian liberalism—which I call progressive liberalism—played a key role in fostering the growth of liberal idealist work in recent decades. See Simhony and Weinstein, The New Liberalism.

91.与自然权利的概念截然相反，T·H·格林写道：“因此，任何人只有在以下情况下才能拥有权利：（1）作为社会成员；（2）该社会中，某些共同利益被社会成员公认为他们自身的理想利益，即每个人都应享有的利益。”格林，《政治义务原则讲义》（安娜堡：密歇根大学出版社，1967年），第45页。关于这一点，参见西蒙尼和温斯坦，《新自由主义》，第16页。

91. In direct contrast to the concept of natural rights, T. H. Green writes: “No one therefore can have a right except (1) as a member of a society, and (2) of a society in which some common good is recognized by the members of the society as their own ideal good, as that which should be for each of them.” Green, Lectures on the Principles of Political Obligation (Ann Arbor: University of Michigan Press, 1967), p. 45. For more on this point, see Simhony and Weinstein, The New Liberalism, p. 16.

92.自由主义理想主义者实际上认为自由主义和民族主义可以融合为一个统一的意识形态。我的论点是，它们是两种不同的主义，有着不同的核心逻辑，因此无法统一。尽管如此，它们可以在国家内部共存，但这两种主义之间始终存在着冲突的可能性。

92. Liberal idealists effectively believe that liberalism and nationalism can be integrated into a single coherent ideology. My argument is that they are separate isms with different core logics, and thus they cannot be unified. Nevertheless, they can coexist within states, although there is always the possibility that those two isms will come into conflict with each other.

第四章 自由主义大厦的裂缝

Chapter 4. Cracks in the Liberal Edifice

1.社群主义者一直以来都强烈批评自由主义关于人类天生是“不受束缚”的个体的假设（借用迈克尔·桑德尔的说法）。关于社群主义者和自由主义者就此及其他问题展开的辩论，可参阅什洛莫·阿维内里和阿夫纳·德-沙利特合著的《社群主义与个人主义》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2011年）。桑德尔的引文出自该书第18页。

1. Communitarians have been arch critics of liberalism’s assumption that humans are naturally “unencumbered” individuals, to use Michael Sandel’s wording. For a sampling of the debate between communitarians and liberals on this and other matters, see Shlomo Avineri and Avner de-Shalit, Communitarianism and Individualism (New York: Oxford University Press, 2011). The Sandel quote is from p. 18.

2. “民族”是一个抽象概念，本身无法采取行动，但我使用这个词是为了方便指代其成员，尤其是其精英阶层，他们拥有自主权，能够采取行动来实现其政治目标，例如争取建国。同样的逻辑也适用于“国家”一词，在这种情况下，拥有自主权的是政治领导人。

2. A nation is an abstract concept and cannot act, but I use the term as a shorthand reference for its members, especially its elites, who do have agency and are capable of acting to advance their political goals, such as statehood. The same logic applies when I use the term state, in which case it is the political leaders who have agency.

3.参见欧内斯特·盖尔纳，《民族与民族主义》（纽约州伊萨卡：康奈尔大学出版社，1983年），第1页。我对民族主义的定义与许多学者的定义相似。例如，参见约翰·布鲁伊利，《民族主义与国家》（芝加哥：芝加哥大学出版社，1985年），第1-3页；恩斯特·B·哈斯，“什么是民族主义？我们为什么要研究它？”，《国际组织》 40卷3期（1986年夏季）：726；E·J·霍布斯鲍姆，《1780年以来的民族与民族主义：纲领、神话与现实》（纽约：剑桥大学出版社，1991年），第9页；安东尼·D·史密斯， 《全球化时代的民族与民族主义》（马萨诸塞州莫尔登：政体出版社，1995年），第55页、150页。

3. See Ernest Gellner, Nations and Nationalism (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 1983), p. 1. My definition of nationalism is similar to that of many scholars. See, for example, John Breuilly, Nationalism and the State (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1985), pp. 1–3; Ernst B. Haas, “What Is Nationalism and Why Should We Study It?,” International Organization 40, no. 3 (Summer 1986): 726; E. J. Hobsbawm, Nations and Nationalism since 1780: Programme, Myth, Reality (New York: Cambridge University Press, 1991), p. 9; Anthony D. Smith, Nations and Nationalism in a Global Era (Malden, MA: Polity Press, 1995), pp. 55, 150.

4. Benedict Anderson，《想象的共同体：民族主义的起源与传播的反思》（伦敦：Verso出版社，1990年）；David A. Bell，《法国的民族崇拜：民族主义的发明，1680-1800》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，2001年）；William H. Sewell Jr.，“法国大革命与民族形式的出现”，载于Michael A. Morrison和Melinda Zook编，《革命潮流：跨大西洋世界的民族构建》（马里兰州兰哈姆：Rowman and Littlefield出版社，2004年），第91-125页。

4. Benedict Anderson, Imagined Communities: Reflections on the Origin and Spread of Nationalism (London: Verso, 1990); David A. Bell, The Cult of the Nation in France: Inventing Nationalism, 1680–1800 (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 2001); William H. Sewell Jr., “The French Revolution and the Emergence of the Nation Form,” in Revolutionary Currents: Nation Building in the Transatlantic World, ed. Michael A. Morrison and Melinda Zook (Lanham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield, 2004), pp. 91–125.

5.一些先于民族国家形成的大型群体特征鲜明，也比较容易演变为民族国家。例如，荷兰人、英国人、法国人、波兰人和俄罗斯人在各自成为民族国家之前就已经形成了鲜明的民族认同，这使得他们向民族国家的过渡相对顺利。用罗纳德·苏尼的话来说，他们从“文化或民族意识”发展到“成熟的政治民族主义——即积极致力于实现民族目标”。（罗纳德·G·苏尼，《过去的复仇：民族主义、革命与苏联解体》 （斯坦福，加州：斯坦福大学出版社，1993年），第48页）。然而，也有一些例子表明，最终形成的民族国家与其前身之间的联系更为薄弱。例如，阿塞拜疆人、白俄罗斯人、意大利人和立陶宛人在成为民族国家之前并没有形成特定的民族认同。其他地方性和社会认同对他们来说至关重要，这必然意味着国家必须竭尽全力将它们塑造成民族。一些探讨民族与其前身之间联系的重要著作包括：约翰·阿姆斯特朗，《民族主义之前的民族》（教堂山：北卡罗来纳大学出版社，1982年）；帕特里克·J·吉里，《民族的神话：欧洲的中世纪起源》（普林斯顿，新泽西州：普林斯顿大学出版社，2003年）；菲利普·S·戈尔斯基，“马赛克时刻：早期现代主义对现代主义民族主义理论的批判”，《美国社会学杂志》 105卷，第5期（2000年3月）：1428-1468页；安东尼·W·马克思，《对民族的信仰：民族主义的排他性起源》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2003年）；米罗斯拉夫·赫罗赫，《欧洲民族：解释它们的形成》（译者：约翰·阿姆斯特朗，1982年）。 Karolina Graham（纽约：Verso，2015 年），第 3 章；Philip G. Roeder，《民族国家的起源：民族主义时代的制度变迁》（新泽西州普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，2007 年）；Anthony D. Smith，《民族的种族起源》（纽约：Basil Blackwell，1989 年）。

5. Some of the large groups that preceded the nation were rather well defined and quite easily morphed into nations. For example, the Dutch, the English, the French, the Poles, and the Russians had developed a distinct identity before each group became a nation, which made the transition to nationhood relatively straightforward. To put the matter in Ronald Suny’s language, they went from “cultural or ethnic awareness” to “full-blown political nationalism—that is, an active commitment to realizing a national agenda.” Ronald G. Suny, The Revenge of the Past: Nationalism, Revolution, and the Collapse of the Soviet Union (Stanford, CA: Stanford University Press, 1993), p. 48. There are other cases, however, where the links between the nations that eventually emerged and their predecessors are more tenuous. Examples include Azerbaijanis, Belorussians, Italians, and Lithuanians, who did not have that particular identity before they became nations. Other local and social identities were key for them, which invariably meant that the state had to go to great lengths to fashion them into nations. Some key works dealing with the links between nations and their predecessors include John Armstrong, Nations before Nationalism (Chapel Hill: University of North Carolina Press, 1982); Patrick J. Geary, The Myth of Nations: The Medieval Origins of Europe (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2003); Philip S. Gorski, “The Mosaic Moment: An Early Modernist Critique of Modernist Theories of Nationalism,” American Journal of Sociology 105, no. 5 (March 2000): 1428–68; Anthony W. Marx, Faith in Nation: Exclusionary Origins of Nationalism (New York: Oxford University Press, 2003); Miroslav Hroch, European Nations: Explaining Their Formation, trans. Karolina Graham (New York: Verso, 2015), chap. 3; Philip G. Roeder, Where Nation-States Come From: Institutional Change in the Age of Nationalism (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2007); Anthony D. Smith, The Ethnic Origins of Nations (New York: Basil Blackwell, 1989).

6.安德森，《想象的共同体》。

6. Anderson, Imagined Communities.

7.关于民族主义兴起后社会群体间的界限如何变得不那么模糊、更难渗透，参见弗雷德里克·巴特主编的《族群与边界：文化差异的社会组织》（伊利诺伊州朗格罗夫：韦弗兰出版社，1998年）。詹姆斯·斯科特写道，在民族国家之外，社会结构具有“完全的可塑性”。在那样的世界里，“群体边界是开放的，身份认同是灵活的”。参见詹姆斯·斯科特，《不被统治的艺术：东南亚高地无政府主义史》（康涅狄格州纽黑文：耶鲁大学出版社，2009年），第219、249页。

7. On how boundaries between social groups have become less fluid and harder to penetrate with the coming of nationalism, see Fredrik Barth, ed., Ethnic Groups and Boundaries: The Social Organization of Culture Difference (Long Grove, IL: Waveland Press, 1998). James Scott writes about the “utter plasticity of social structure” outside nation-states. In that world, “group boundaries are porous and identities are flexible.” James Scott, The Art of Not Being Governed: An Anarchist History of Upland Southeast Asia (New Haven, CT: Yale University Press, 2009), pp. 219, 249.

8.关于民族主义与“所有公民平等和自由的诉求”之间的密切联系的讨论，请参见 Dominique Schnapper 的文章“欧洲的公民身份和民族认同”，载于《民族与民族主义》第 8 卷第 1 期（2002 年 1 月）：1-14 页。引文出自第 2 页。

8. For a discussion of the close links between nationalism and “claims for the equality and liberty of all citizens,” see Dominique Schnapper, “Citizenship and National Identity in Europe,” Nations and Nationalism 8, no. 1 (January 2002): 1–14. The quote is from p. 2.

9.安德森，《想象的共同体》，第 16 页。

9. Anderson, Imagined Communities, p. 16.

10. Geary，《民族的神话》，第118页。他还写道：“随着效忠关系的不断变化、联姻、转型和财产的挪用，似乎唯一不变的只有名称，而这些名称在不同的时期可以承载不同的内容”（同上）。另见Norman Davies，《消失的王国：国家与民族的兴衰》 （纽约：企鹅出版社，2011年），尤其是第1-6章。

10. Geary, The Myth of Nations, p. 118. He also writes: “With the constant shifting of allegiances, intermarriages, transformations, and appropriations, it appears that all that remained constant were names, and these were vessels that could hold different contents at different times” (ibid.). Also see Norman Davies, Vanished Kingdoms: The Rise and Fall of States and Nations (New York: Penguin Books, 2011), especially chaps. 1–6.

11.有人或许会认为罗马帝国与我的论点相悖，但这种想法是错误的。罗马帝国是一个幅员辽阔的政治实体，包含众多社会群体。它很难说是一种统一的文化。正如吉里所指出的，“罗马人”并非“居住在罗马帝国境内（无论永久还是暂时）的数百万人的主要自我认同。人们更倾向于认同阶级、职业或城市，而不是民族或种族认同。” 事实上，“在罗马多元的宗教和文化传统中，中央政府从未要求人们绝对遵守罗马价值观。”（吉里，《民族的神话》，第64、67页）罗马帝国居民的主要忠诚对象是他们特定的社会群体，而这些群体通常占据着帝国境内的特定领土。因此，除了罗马城的居民之外，“罗马身份”的概念在中世纪的欧洲几乎消失殆尽也就不足为奇了。当然，从962年到1806年确实存在过神圣罗马帝国，但与它的前身一样，它由众多社会群体组成，几乎没有人认同自己是罗马人。值得注意的是，民族主义在19世纪初摧毁这个松散帝国的残余势力中发挥了关键作用。

11. One might think the Roman Empire contradicts my claim, but this would be wrong. The Roman Empire was a sprawling political entity that was home to numerous social groups. It was hardly a unified culture. “Roman,” as Geary notes, was not a “primary self-identifier for the millions of people who inhabited, permanently or temporarily, the Roman Empire. Rather than sharing a national or ethnic identity, individuals were more likely to feel a primary attachment to class, occupation, or city.” Indeed, “in the pluralistic religious and cultural tradition of Rome, the central state had never demanded exclusive adherence to Roman values.” Geary, The Myth of Nations, pp. 64, 67. The primary loyalty of the inhabitants of the Roman Empire was to their particular social group, which invariably occupied a particular slice of territory within the empire. Thus, it is no surprise that the concept of “Roman identity” virtually disappeared from Europe in the Middle Ages, save for the inhabitants of the city of Rome. Of course, there was a Holy Roman Empire from 962 to 1806, but like its predecessor, it comprised numerous social groups, and hardly any of the people who came under its sway identified themselves as Romans. It is worth noting that nationalism played the key role in destroying what remained of that loosely knit empire in the early nineteenth century.

12.例如，帕特里克·吉里写道：“在（罗马）帝国的自由公民中，精英阶层与广大民众之间的鸿沟巨大”，这种情况在帝国崩溃后也没有改变。吉里，《民族的神话》，第66页。除了前民族主义时期的两个主要阶级之外，欧洲——贵族和农民——虽然资产阶级和工人阶级规模较小，但主要集中在英国和法国。无论是农民还是贵族，都没有强烈的归属感，更遑论认同自己属于一个庞大的社会群体，更遑论一个独立的民族。农民往往以地方为单位思考问题，不会把自己视为一个遍布广袤领土的大家庭的成员。他们通常说着当地方言，对几日路程之外的其他农民知之甚少。例如，一个生活在普鲁士的农民不太可能认为自己是普鲁士农民，也不会将自己与法国或波兰的农民相提并论。他的身份认同更可能建立在与近邻的比较之上。贵族则具有显著的国际视野，完全没有民族认同感。这一点可以从欧洲贵族的婚姻中得到印证，他们的婚姻往往发生在来自不同国家的人之间。值得注意的是，普鲁士国王腓特烈大帝非常推崇法国文化，并且更喜欢说法语而不是德语。参见蒂姆·布兰宁，《腓特烈大帝：普鲁士国王》（纽约：兰登书屋，2016年），第342-346页、352-353页、357-361页、444页。简而言之，“在民族主义出现之前，贵族与农民属于同一文化的想法，对前者而言一定是令人憎恶的，对后者而言则是难以理解的。”参见托马斯·H·埃里克森，《族群与民族主义：人类学视角》，第三版（伦敦：冥王星出版社，2010年），第123页。

12. Patrick Geary writes, for example, “Among the free citizens of the [Roman] Empire, the gulfs separating the elite and the masses of the population were enormous,” a situation that did not change after the collapse of the empire. Geary, The Myth of Nations, p. 66. In addition to the two dominant classes in pre-nationalist Europe—the aristocracy and the peasantry—there was a small bourgeoisie and a small working class, although they were largely concentrated in England and France. Neither the peasantry nor the aristocracy had a powerful sense it was part of a large social group, much less a distinct nation. Peasants tended to think in local terms and not conceive of themselves as part of an extended family that spread across a large expanse of territory. They usually spoke in local dialects and knew little about other peasants who lived a few days’ travel from them. A peasant living in Prussia, for example, was not likely to think of himself as a Prussian peasant and compare himself with French or Polish peasants. His identity was more likely to be wrapped up in comparisons with his immediate neighbors. Aristocrats were remarkably cosmopolitan and had nothing like a national identity. This point is illustrated by looking at marriages among the European nobility, which were often between individuals from different countries. And consider that Frederick the Great of Prussia greatly admired French culture and preferred speaking French rather than German. Tim Blanning, Frederick the Great: King of Prussia (New York: Random House, 2016), pp. 342–46, 352–53, 357–61, 444. In short, “the idea that the aristocracy belonged to the same culture as the peasants must have seemed abominable to the former and incomprehensible to the latter before nationalism.” Thomas H. Eriksen, Ethnicity and Nationalism: Anthropological Perspectives, 3rd ed. (London: Pluto Press, 2010), p. 123.

17.多民族国家始终存在这样的风险：一个或多个较小的民族可能会脱离现有体制，建立自己的民族国家。在这样不稳定的国家里，谈论国家层面的共同民族认同意义不大。

17. There is always the danger with multinational states that one or more of the minor nations will be committed to breaking away and forming their own nation-states. In such unstable states, it makes little sense to talk about a common national identity at the level of the state.

25.这种沙文主义在很大程度上是民族国家特有的统一感所致。特别是，民族成员之间紧密的联系以及国家之间泾渭分明的边界，助长了狭隘的思想。在一个身份认同更加灵活、人们能够轻松跨越社会群体边界的世界里，沙文主义的可能性就较小。简而言之，更高的社会流动性往往有助于增强宽容。然而，这并非意味着民族国家出现之前的大型社会群体就是宽容的典范，因为它们并非如此。但它们比民族国家更加宽容，沙文主义也更少。在民族国家中，成员之间的联系紧密，身份认同难以改变，这些因素容易使人将“他者”视为异己、低劣，甚至是邪恶的。波兰与犹太人的关系就是一个很好的例证。在民族主义兴起之前，波兰按照欧洲的标准来看是一个宽容的地方，在中世纪时期，波兰是犹太人的避难所。据估计，到十六世纪中叶，世界上大约80%的犹太人居住在波兰，按照当时的时代标准，这些犹太人的生活状况相当不错。然而，随着十九世纪和二十世纪民族主义席卷欧洲，这种情况发生了巨大变化，波兰也成为该地区反犹主义最严重的国家之一。参见布莱恩·波特（Brian Porter）的《当民族主义开始仇恨：想象十九世纪波兰的现代政治》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2000年）。这种普遍现象并非波兰独有。参见什穆埃尔·阿尔莫格（Shmuel Almog）的《现代欧洲的民族主义与反犹主义，1815-1945》（纽约州埃尔姆斯福德：珀伽蒙出版社，1990年）；蒂莫西·斯奈德（Timothy Snyder）的《国家的重建：波兰、乌克兰、立陶宛、白俄罗斯，1569-1999》（康涅狄格州纽黑文：耶鲁大学出版社，2004年）。

25. This chauvinism is in good part a consequence of the sense of oneness that characterizes nations. In particular, the tight bonds among nationals and the firm boundaries between nations promote narrow-mindedness. Chauvinism is less likely in a world where identities are more flexible and people can envision themselves moving rather easily across the boundaries that separate social groups. Greater social fluidity, in short, tends to enhance tolerance. This is not to say, however, that the large social groups that existed before the coming of nations were paragons of tolerance, because they were not. But they were more tolerant and less chauvinistic than nations, where the bonds among members are tight and identities are difficult to change, considerations that lend themselves to seeing the “other” as alien and inferior, and even evil. Polish-Jewish relations provide a good example of this phenomenon at work. Poland, which was a tolerant place by European standards before the rise of nationalism, was a haven for Jews during the Middle Ages. Some estimate that roughly 80 percent of world Jewry lived in Poland by the middle of the sixteenth century, and those Jews did well for themselves by the standards of the time. This situation changed dramatically in the nineteenth and twentieth centuries as nationalism swept across Europe, and Poland became one of the most anti-Semitic countries in that region. See Brian Porter, When Nationalism Began to Hate: Imagining Modern Politics in Nineteenth-Century Poland (New York: Oxford University Press, 2000). This general pattern was not restricted to Poland. See Shmuel Almog, Nationalism and Antisemitism in Modern Europe, 1815–1945 (Elmsford, NY: Pergamon Press, 1990); Timothy Snyder, The Reconstruction of Nations: Poland, Ukraine, Lithuania, Belarus, 1569–1999 (New Haven, CT: Yale University Press, 2004).

36.在2017年中印两国就喜马拉雅山脉34平方英里土地发生争端期间，中国国家主席习近平表示：“我们绝不允许任何人、任何组织、任何政党在任何时候、以任何形式从中国分裂出任何一块领土……任何人都不要抱有任何幻想，认为我们会吞下损害国家主权、安全和发展利益的苦果。”（引自克里斯·巴克利和艾伦·巴里，《中国告诉印度，它不会在边界争端中退让》，《纽约时报》，2017年8月4日）这并非意味着一个国家占领或试图征服的所有领土都是神圣不可侵犯的。也有例外。例如，中国已经与邻国解决了一些领土争端，在每一起案例中，中国都做出了妥协，包括向其他国家让渡部分领土。参见M. Taylor Fravel，《强硬边界，安全国家：中国领土争端中的合作与冲突》（普林斯顿，新泽西州：普林斯顿大学出版社，2008年）。然而，中国绝不会轻易放弃大片领土，因为这些领土被视为神圣之地，理应属于中华民族。

36. During the 2017 dispute between China and India over thirty-four square miles of land in the Himalayan Mountains, China’s president, Xi Jinping, said: “We will never permit anybody, any organization, any political party to split off any piece of Chinese territory from China at any time or in any form. . . . Nobody should nurse any hope that we will swallow the bitter fruit of harm to our national sovereignty, security and development interests.” Quoted in Chris Buckley and Ellen Barry, “China Tells India That It Won’t Back Down in Border Dispute,” New York Times, August 4, 2017. This is not to say that all the territory a nation occupies or seeks to conquer is holy land. There are exceptions. China, for example, has settled a number of territorial disputes with its neighbors, and in each case China made compromises that involved surrendering territory to other countries. See M. Taylor Fravel, Strong Borders, Secure Nation: Cooperation and Conflict in China’s Territorial Disputes (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2008). There are large swaths of territory, however, that China would never surrender willingly, because they are considered sacred lands that rightfully belong to the Chinese nation.

37.卡德尔坎，《生存政治、民族主义与领土战争》。当然，出于实际原因，各国仍然重视领土，尽管如今出于经济和安全考虑，控制领土的重要性已不如工业革命和核武器出现之前。但具有讽刺意味的是，民族主义时代的人们似乎比他们的前辈更重视领土，因为他们在深层次的情感上对自己的祖国怀有强烈的感情（第21页）。

37. Kadercan, “Politics of Survival, Nationalism, and War for Territory.” Of course, nations still care about territory for practical reasons, although controlling territory is not as important today for economic and security reasons as it was before the coming of the Industrial Revolution and nuclear weapons. But ironically, people in the age of nationalism appear to care more about territory than did their predecessors, because they care greatly about their homeland at a deep emotional level (p. 21).

38.正如玛丽亚·格林伯格所指出的，尽管主权概念总是与国家联系在一起，但它也可以应用于其他政治形式。关键在于，它只能应用于国际体系中最高层级的政治组织形式，无论是帝国、城邦还是其他任何形式。然而，本文的讨论仅限于国家，因为重点在于民族主义，而民族主义与民族国家密切相关。格林伯格，《不可分割的主权：权力委托与退出选择》（未发表论文，芝加哥大学，2017年4月24日）。

The discussion here, however, is limited to states, because the focus is on nationalism, which is identified with nation-states. Grinberg, “Indivisible Sovereignty: Delegation of Authority and Exit Option” (unpublished paper, University of Chicago, April 24, 2017).

45.这种蕴含于民族主义中的民主冲动体现在勒南的著名论断中：“如果允许我用这个比喻，一个民族的存在就是一场每日的公民投票。”（勒南，《何谓民族？》，第64页）。另见施纳珀，《欧洲的公民身份与民族认同》；利亚·格林菲尔德，《民族主义：通往现代性的五条道路》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1992年）；以及雅克，《人民主权与民族主义》。格林菲尔德在第64页写道： 10：“主权归于人民，承认人民各阶层之间根本平等，这构成了现代民族理念的精髓，同时也是民主的基本原则。民主诞生于民族意识之中。二者密不可分，脱离这种联系，两者都无法被充分理解。民族主义是民主在世界上的呈现形式，它蕴含在将民族比作茧中的蝴蝶的理念之中。最初，民族主义是作为民主而发展的；在最初发展的条件得以延续的地方，二者之间的同一性得以保持。”

45. This democratic impulse built into nationalism is reflected in Renan’s famous comment: “The existence of a nation is, if you will pardon me the metaphor, a daily plebiscite.” Renan, “What Is a Nation?,” p. 64. Also see Schnapper, “Citizenship and National Identity in Europe”; Liah Greenfield, Nationalism: Five Roads to Modernity (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1992); and Yack, “Popular Sovereignty and Nationalism.” Greenfield writes on p. 10: “The location of sovereignty within the people and the recognition of the fundamental equality among its various strata, which constitute the essence of the modern national idea, are at the same time the basic tenets of democracy. Democracy was born with the sense of nationality. The two are inherently linked, and neither can be fully understood apart from this connection. Nationalism was the form in which democracy appeared in the world, contained in the idea of the nation as a butterfly in a cocoon. Originally, nationalism developed as democracy; where the conditions of such original development persisted, the identity between the two was maintained.”

50.有人认为民族主义可以替代宗教，宗教在1648年三十年战争结束后开始在欧洲失去影响力。此后几个世纪，这一进程加速。然而，这种观点是错误的。尽管宗教的影响力在漫长的历史时期中有所减弱，但它绝没有消失。更重要的是，宗教实际上是民族文化的一个组成部分，它有可能成为群体成员之间强大的凝聚力。参见欧内斯特·巴克，《基督教与民族性：1927年伯奇纪念讲座》（牛津：克拉伦登出版社，1927年），第31页。其他阐述宗教如何增强民族主义力量的著作包括塞缪尔·P·亨廷顿，《我们是谁？美国民族认同面临的挑战》（纽约：西蒙与舒斯特出版社，2005年）；以及马克思，《民族信仰》。

50. Nationalism is sometimes said to be a substitute for religion, which began losing influence in Europe after the Thirty Years’ War ended in 1648. This process has accelerated over the ensuing centuries. This perspective is wrong, however. Although religion’s influence has waned over this long period, it cetainly has not disappeared. More importantly, religion is effectively an element of national culture, where it has the potential to act as a powerful unifying force for group members. Ernest Barker, Christianity and Nationality: Being the Burge Memorial Lecture for the Year 1927 (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1927), p. 31. Other works that show how religion can act as a force multiplier for nationalism include Samuel P. Huntington, Who Are We? The Challenges to American National Identity (New York: Simon & Schuster, 2005); and Marx, Faith in Nation.

61.从斯科特的《不被统治的艺术》一书中可以清楚地看出，类似的逻辑也适用于生活在国家之外并试图避免被纳入国家体系的群体。他写道：“只要有可能……该地区的所有国家都试图将这些群体纳入其日常行政管理之下，鼓励（在极少数情况下，甚至强制）他们在语言、文化和宗教上与国家核心区的大多数人口保持一致”（第12页）。如今，国家的影响力如此之大，以至于很少有群体仍然生活在国家之外。

61. It is clear from Scott’s The Art of Not Being Governed that a similar logic applies to groups that live outside states and are trying to avoid being incorporated into them. He writes: “Where they could . . . all states in the region have tried to bring such peoples under their routine administration, to encourage and, more rarely, to insist upon linguistic, cultural, and religious alignment with the majority population at the state core” (p. 12). The state’s reach is so great today that very few groups continue to live outside a state.

65.前一段所述的经济逻辑具有重要的军事意义。由于财富是军事力量的两大基石之一，任何促进经济增长的措施都有助于打造更强大的军队。参见约翰·J·米尔斯海默，《大国政治的悲剧》，修订版（纽约：诺顿出版社，2014年），第3章。

65. The economic logic described in the previous paragraph has important military consequences. Since wealth is one of the two main building blocks of military power, any measures taken to grow the economy contribute to building a more powerful military. See John J. Mearsheimer, The Tragedy of Great Power Politics, updated ed. (New York: Norton, 2014), chap. 3.

91.尽管克里斯托弗·H·阿亨和拉里·M·巴特尔斯并非直接关注民族主义，但他们对美国政治运作的论述与我关于自由主义与民族主义关系的观点不谋而合。具体而言，他们在《现实主义者的民主：为何选举无法产生响应型政府》（普林斯顿，新泽西州：普林斯顿大学出版社，2016）一书中指出，美国人的投票行为最好用他们的社会和群体认同来解释，而不是用每个人如何评价政治人物在他们最关心的问题上的立场来解释。

Specifically, they argue in Democracy for Realists: Why Elections Do Not Produce Responsive Government (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2016) that the voting behavior of Americans can best be explained by their social and group identities, not by how each individual assesses a politician’s position on the issues he cares about most.

92.大多数自由主义理论家都承认个人拥有重要的社会关系。例如，约翰·罗尔斯写道：“每个人出生时都被置于特定社会中的特定位置，而他所处位置的性质会实质性地影响他的人生前景。”（约翰·罗尔斯，《正义论》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1971年），第13页）。此外，在《万民法：重访公共理性观念》 （马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1999年）中，罗尔斯直接关注“人民”（peoples），这是“民族”（nations）的同义词。尽管如此， 《万民法》中的许多分析仍然侧重于个人，这无疑也是他另外两部开创性著作—— 《正义论》和《政治自由主义》（增订版，纽约：哥伦比亚大学出版社，2005年）——的关注焦点。然而，基于个人主义的理论无法同时强调人是深刻的社会性的，因为这两种视角是相互矛盾的。事实上，罗尔斯在这一点上受到了批评。例如，参见 Andrew Kuper，“罗尔斯式的全球正义：超越万民法，走向世界主义的人身法”，《政治理论》 28，第5期（2000年10月）：640-74；Thomas W. Pogge，“罗尔斯正义理论之间的矛盾”，《福特汉姆法律评论》 72，第5期（2004年4月）：1739-59。关于罗尔斯批评者和支持者之间辩论的概述，参见 Gillian Brock，《全球正义：一种世界主义的解释》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2009年），第二章。

92. Most liberal theorists acknowledge that individuals have important social ties. John Rawls, for example, writes: “Each person finds himself placed at birth in some particular position in some particular society, and the nature of his position materially affects his life prospects.” John Rawls, A Theory of Justice (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1971), p. 13. Moreover, in The Law of Peoples: With “The Idea of Public Reason Revisited” (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1999), Rawls focuses directly on peoples, which is a synonym for nations. Still, much of the analysis in The Law of Peoples focuses on the individual, which is certainly the focus of attention in his other two seminal book, A Theory of Justice and Political Liberalism, expanded ed. (New York: Columbia University Press, 2005). Nevertheless, a theory based on individualism cannot at the same time emphasize that people are profoundly social, because the two perspectives are at odds with each other. In fact, Rawls has been criticized on this point. For example, see Andrew Kuper, “Rawlsian Global Justice: Beyond the Law of Peoples to a Cosmopolitan Law of Persons,” Political Theory 28, no. 5 (October 2000): 640–74; Thomas W. Pogge, “The Incoherence between Rawls’s Theories of Justice,” Fordham Law Review 72, no. 5 (April 2004): 1739–59. For an overview of the debate between Rawls’s critics and defenders, see Gillian Brock, Global Justice: A Cosmopolitan Account (New York: Oxford University Press, 2009), chap. 2.

112.在西方传播自由权利的困难是两本近期出版的人权史著作的核心主题：亨特的《人权的发明》和塞缪尔·莫恩的《最后的乌托邦：人权史》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，2010年）。两位作者都明确指出，不可剥夺权利的概念在18世纪后期随着美国《独立宣言》（1776年）和法国《人权和公民权宣言》（1789年）的发表而首次获得广泛关注。但在接下来的大约150年里，西方对个人权利的重视程度并不高。亨特认为，人权问题在1948年再次成为一个显著重要的议题，而莫恩则坚持认为，这种情况直到1977年才出现。另见马库斯·费舍尔，《自由和平：伦理、历史和哲学层面》（哈佛大学肯尼迪政府学院BCSIA讨论稿2000-07，2000年4月），第20-22页。值得注意的是，偶然性是亨特和莫恩论述的核心。例如，亨特写道：“然而，即使是自然性、平等性和普遍性也还不够。人权只有获得政治内涵才有意义。它们不是处于自然状态下的人类的权利；它们是处于社会中的人类的权利”（第21页）。换句话说，她是在反对自然权利。对莫恩而言，人权“只是众多吸引人的意识形态之一”（第5页）。

112. The difficulty of spreading liberal rights in the West is a central theme in two recent books dealing with the history of human rights: Hunt, Inventing Human Rights; and Samuel Moyn, The Last Utopia: Human Rights in History (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 2010). Both authors make it clear that the concept of inalienable rights first gained widespread attention in the latter part of the eighteenth century with the American Declaration of Independence (1776) and the French Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen (1789). But for roughly the next 150 years, individual rights were not paid great attention within the West. Hunt argues they once again became a subject of marked importance in 1948, while Moyn maintains that this did not happen until 1977. Also see Markus Fischer, “The Liberal Peace: Ethical, Historical, and Philosophical Aspects” (BCSIA Discussion Paper 2000-07, Kennedy School of Government, Harvard University, April 2000), pp. 20–22. It is worth noting that contingency is at the core of both Hunt’s and Moyn’s stories. Hunt writes, for example: “Yet even naturalness, equality, and universality are not quite enough. Human rights only become meaningful when they gain political content. They are not the rights of humans in a state of nature; they are the rights of humans in society” (p. 21). In other words, she is arguing against natural rights. For Moyn, human rights were “only one appealing ideology among others” (p. 5).

第五章 自由主义走向世界

Chapter 5. Liberalism Goes Abroad

1.关于自由民主促进繁荣的说法，参见 Michael C. Desch，《权力与军事效能：民主胜利主义的谬误》（巴尔的摩：约翰·霍普金斯大学出版社，2008 年），第 52-53 页；易峰，“民主、政治稳定与经济增长”，《英国政治科学杂志》 27，第 3 期（1997 年 7 月）：391-418；David A. Lake，“强大的和平主义者：民主国家与战争”，《美国政治科学评论》 86，第 1 期（1992 年 3 月）：24-37。

1. Concerning the claim that liberal democracy promotes prosperity, see Michael C. Desch, Power and Military Effectiveness: The Fallacy of Democratic Triumphalism (Baltimore: Johns Hopkins University Press, 2008), pp. 52–53; Yi Feng, “Democracy, Political Stability, and Economic Growth,” British Journal of Political Science 27, no. 3 (July 1997): 391–418; David A. Lake, “Powerful Pacifists: Democratic States and War,” American Political Science Review 86, no. 1 (March 1992): 24–37.

2.大多数外交政策分析家和学者认为，自冷战结束以来，国际体系一直是单极的，美国是唯一的极点。其他国家可以被归类为主要强国或次要强国，但不能称之为大国。参见努诺·P·蒙泰罗，《单极政治理论》（纽约：剑桥大学出版社，2014）。与此相反，我认为世界一直是多极的，因为中国和俄罗斯也是大国。约翰·J·米尔斯海默《大国政治的悲剧》（修订版，纽约：诺顿出版社，2014年）。毫无疑问，美国的实力远超其他两个大国。事实上，它是这三个大国中唯一的超级大国。因此，我对全球权力平衡的看法与那些认为世界格局为单极格局的人几乎没有分歧。鉴于此，再加上流行语汇的演变，我用“单极格局”而非“失衡的多极格局”来描述自1989年以来的体系架构。尽管如此，我认为，一个远强于其他多极格局竞争对手的大国，同样可以自由地追求自由主义霸权，这主要是因为较弱的大国几乎没有能力挑战其境外的主导国家。

2. Most foreign policy analysts and scholars believe that the international system has been unipolar since the Cold War ended, and the United States is the sole pole. The other states can be categorized as either major or minor powers, but not great powers. See Nuno P. Monteiro, Theory of Unipolar Politics (New York: Cambridge University Press, 2014). In contrast, I believe the world has been multipolar, as China and Russia are also great powers. John J. Mearsheimer, The Tragedy of Great Power Politics, updated ed. (New York: Norton, 2014). There is no question, however, that the United States is far more powerful than those other two great powers. Indeed, it is the only superpower among the three. Thus, there is little daylight between my view of the global balance of power and those who see unipolarity. Given this fact, coupled with how the popular lexicon has evolved, I use the term unipolarity, not unbalanced multipolarity, to describe the architecture of the system since 1989. Nevertheless, I believe that a great power that is far stronger than its rivals in multipolarity would also be free to pursue liberal hegemony, mainly because the weaker great powers would have few capabilities that could be used to challenge the dominant state outside their own borders.

3. Michael W. Doyle，“自由主义与世界政治”，《美国政治科学评论》 80，第 4 期（1986 年 12 月）：1161。

4.一些学者认为，自由民主国家之间不发生战争的原因在于民主制度的某些特定特征，而非自由主义本身。换言之，这些替代解释并未强调不可剥夺权利的重要性，而这正是自由主义对这一现象的解释。在第七章中，我将评估那些被认为能够防止自由民主国家之间发生战争的民主制度的特定属性。

4. Some scholars maintain that particular features of democracy, not liberalism, account for why liberal democracies do not war with each other. Those alternative accounts, in other words, do not emphasize the importance of inalienable rights, which is the liberal explanation for this purported phenomenon. In chapter 7, I assess those particular attributes of democracies that are said to prevent war between liberal democracies.

20.现实主义有两种基本形式：人性现实主义和结构现实主义。本文提出的理论显然属于后者，因为它强调国际体系的总体设计导致各国追求权力。另一方面，人性现实主义者认为，国家追求权力主要是因为大多数人天生就具有根深蒂固的权力意志，这实际上意味着国家是由那些一心想让本国凌驾于竞争对手之上的个人领导的。例如，汉斯·摩根索认为，个人具有支配欲，这是人类行为以及国家行为背后的驱动力。参见汉斯·J·摩根索，《科学人与权力政治》（伦敦：拉蒂默出版社，1947年），第165-167页。另见汉斯·J·摩根索，《国家间政治》，第5版（纽约：克诺夫出版社，1973年），第34-35页。对于持这种观点的现实主义者而言，权力主要是一种目的本身，而不是像结构主义者那样是一种生存手段。现实主义者。然而，人性现实主义者确实将生存逻辑融入到他们的论述中，这在很大程度上是因为，在一个充满侵略性和潜在危险邻国的世界中运作的国家，别无选择，只能担忧自身的生存，即便它们的最终目标是为了攫取权力本身。关于美国现实主义思想的演变，参见尼古拉斯·吉尔霍特，《启蒙运动之后：二十世纪中期的政治现实主义与国际关系》（纽约：剑桥大学出版社，2017年）；布莱恩·C·施密特，《无政府主义的政治话语：国际关系学科史》（纽约州奥尔巴尼：纽约州立大学出版社，1998年）。

20. Realism comes in two basic forms: human nature and structural. The theory presented here clearly falls in the latter category, as it emphasizes that the overarching design of the international system causes states to pursue power. For human nature realists, on the other hand, states want power largely because most people are born with a will to power hardwired into them, which effectively means countries are led by individuals bent on having their state dominate its rivals. Hans Morgenthau, for example, maintained that individuals have an animus dominandi, which is the driving force behind human behavior as well as state behavior. Hans J. Morgenthau, Scientific Man vs. Power Politics (London: Latimer House, 1947), pp. 165–67. Also see Hans J. Morgenthau, Politics among Nations, 5th ed. (New York: Knopf, 1973), pp. 34–35. For realists of this persuasion, power is principally an end in itself, not a means to survival, as it is for structural realists. Nevertheless, human nature realists do incorporate survival logic into their story, in large part because states operating in a world filled with aggressive and potentially dangerous neighbors have no choice but to worry about their survival, even if their ultimate goal is to gain power for its own sake. On the evolution of realist thinking in the United States, see Nicolas Guilhot, After the Enlightenment: Political Realism and International Relations in the Mid-twentieth Century (New York: Cambridge University Press, 2017); Brian C. Schmidt, The Political Discourse of Anarchy: A Disciplinary History of International Relations (Albany, NY: State University of New York Press, 1998).

25.没有哪个国家能够成为全球霸权，这主要是由于地理限制。地球的辽阔，加上几个巨大海洋的存在，使得任何国家都不可能完全主宰地球。一个国家所能期望的最好结果是成为区域霸权，这意味着主宰其所在的区域。例如，自19世纪末以来，美国一直是西半球的区域霸权。更多详情请参见米尔斯海默的《大国政治的悲剧》，第40-42页。如下文所述，同样排除全球霸权存在的因素也使得世界国家的形成成为不可能。

25. No state can be a global hegemon, mainly because of geographical constraints. The sheer size of the planet, coupled with the presence of a handful of huge oceans, makes it impossible to dominate in its entirety. The best a state can hope for is to be a regional hegemon, which means dominating its own region of the world. The United States, for example, has been a regional hegemon in the Western Hemisphere since the late nineteenth century. For further elaboration, see Mearsheimer, The Tragedy of Great Power Politics, pp. 40–42. As discussed below, the same factors that rule out a global hegemon make a world state impossible.

30.正如前一章所强调的，自由主义的主要缺陷之一在于它将生活在国家内部的人民视为原子化的个体，而事实上，他们本质上是社会性的存在。然而，这一缺陷在国际层面并不适用，因为国家在任何意义上都不是社会实体。它们是本质上以自我为中心的独立政治行为体。当然，现实主义正是这样看待国家的，这有助于解释为什么在国际体系中，那些遵循自由主义原则行事的国家最终会按照权力平衡的逻辑行事。

30. As emphasized in the previous chapter, one of the main weaknesses of liberalism is that it treats the people living inside a state as atomistic individuals, when, in fact, they are social beings at their core. This weakness does not apply at the international level, however, because states are not social entities in any meaningful way. They are individual political actors that are self-regarding at their core. Of course, this is precisely how realism treats states, which helps explain why states acting according to the dictates of liberalism in the international system end up acting according to balance-of-power logic.

52.关于民族主义和现实主义在国际层面的兼容性，有必要略作说明。如前所述，现实主义是一种永恒的理论，这意味着只要体系处于无政府状态且暴力威胁始终存在，构成体系的政治单元类型就无关紧要。然而，现有的国际体系几乎完全由民族国家构成，这意味着民族国家是当代现实主义的主要分析单元。民族国家也是民族主义的关键分析单元。事实上，正如我在第四章中所论述的，民族国家正是民族主义的化身。民族主义和现实主义在解释国际体系中民族国家的行为动机方面也呈现出相似的观点。两者都是特殊主义理论，其中关键行为体是相互自主的单元，它们之间自然而然地进行互动，有时甚至拥有截然不同的利益。由于这些互动可能带来益处也可能造成损害，因此这些单元——这里指的是民族国家——会密切关注其他单元的行为如何影响自身的利益。最终，它们奉行旨在最大化自身利益的政策，有时甚至不惜牺牲其他国家的利益。优先考虑自身福祉有时会导致民族国家寻求伤害甚至摧毁其对手。尽管存在这种自私的行为，但这些国家并非在所有情况下都彼此敌对，当然也并非一直处于战争状态。事实上，它们有时还会相互合作。然而，每个民族国家都清楚，其他国家可能在某个时候对其构成威胁。由于冲突的可能性始终存在，这些国家都担忧自身的生存。即使没有迫在眉睫的威胁，生存依然是每种理论的核心。当然，生存并非民族国家的唯一目标，但它必须是其最高目标，原因显而易见：如果它们无法生存，就无法追求其他目标。简而言之，民族主义和现实主义都与我在第二章中阐述的简明政治理论相符。

52. Some words are in order about the compatibility of nationalism and realism at the international level. As noted, realism is a timeless theory, which means it does not matter what kind of political units make up the system, as long as it is anarchic and the threat of violence is ever present. The existing international system, however, is populated almost exclusively with nation-states, which means that the nation-state is the principal unit of analysis for contemporary realism. The nation-state is also the key unit of analysis for nationalism. Indeed, as I argued in chapter 4, the nation-state is the embodiment of nationalism. Nationalism and realism also tell a similar story about what motivates the behavior of those nation-states in the international system. Both are particularistic theories in which the key actors are autonomous units that interact with each other as a matter of course and sometimes have fundamentally different interests. Because those interactions can be either beneficial or harmful, the units—and here we are talking about nation-states—pay careful attention to how the behavior of other units affects their own interests. In the end, they pursue policies aimed at maximizing their own interests, sometimes at the expense of the other units’ interests. Privileging one’s own well-being occasionally leads nation-states to seek to harm or even destroy their rivals. This selfish behavior notwithstanding, the units are not hostile toward each other in all instances, and they certainly are not in a constant state of war. In fact, they sometimes cooperate with each other. Nevertheless, every nation-state knows that another might threaten it at some point. Because the potential for conflict is always present, the units worry about their survival, even when there is no imminent threat. Thus, survival is at the core of each theory. Of course, survival is not the only goal for nation-states, but it must be their highest goal for the obvious reason that if they do not survive, they cannot pursue their other goals. In short, both nationalism and realism are consistent with my sparse theory of politics laid out in chapter 2.

64. This is the central theme in Dickinson, The European Anarchy. It is important to note that a unipolar international system is fundamentally different from a world state. With unipolarity, the system is anarchic, as it is composed of multiple states, although one state is much more powerful than the others. Each of those states is a sovereign entity. With a world state, there is by definition only one sovereign state on the planet, and thus the system is hierarchic.

第六章 自由主义的弊端

Chapter 6. Liberalism as a Source of Trouble

1.美国国会研究服务处于2017年10月发布了一份报告，列出了1798年至2017年间“美国在海外军事冲突或潜在冲突情况下，或出于正常和平时期目的之外的其他目的使用其武装部队的案例”。芭芭拉·萨拉查·托雷翁，《美国武装部队在海外的使用案例，1798-2017》，国会研究服务处报告，R42738，华盛顿特区，2017年10月12日。报告显示，冷战后时期（1990-2017年）美国出于这些目的进行军事部署的频率是1798年至1989年期间的六倍多。

1. The Congressional Research Service published a report in October 2017 that lists the “instances in which the United States has used its Armed Forces abroad in situations of military conflict or potential conflict or for other than normal peacetime purposes” from 1798 to 2017. Barbara Salazar Torreon, “Instances of Use of United States Armed Forces Abroad, 1798–2017,” Congressional Research Service Report, R42738, Washington, DC, October 12, 2017. It shows that the frequency of U.S. military deployments for those purposes in the post–Cold War period (1990–2017) has been more than six times greater than in the period between 1798 and 1989.

12.卡尔·施密特精辟地指出：“剥夺‘人道’一词的权利，滥用并垄断这一术语，可能会产生某些难以估量的后果，例如否认敌人的人性，并宣布其为人类的弃儿；战争因此可能走向极端非人道的境地。”施密特，《政治的概念》，乔治·施瓦布译（新泽西州新不伦瑞克：罗格斯大学出版社，1976年），第54页。政治哲学家迈克尔·沃尔泽在其著作《正义与非正义的战争》中明确承认了这种倾向，但他决心与之抗争，因为他的目标是限制战争，而不是发动十字军东征。沃尔泽，《正义与非正义的战争：以历史例证论证的道德论证》（纽约：基础出版社，2007年），第七章。

12. Carl Schmitt captures this point: “To confiscate the word humanity, to invoke and monopolize such a term probably has certain incalculable effects, such as denying the enemy the quality of being human and declaring him to be an outlaw of humanity; and a war can thereby be driven to the most extreme inhumanity.” Schmitt, The Concept of the Political, trans. George Schwab (New Brunswick, NJ: Rutgers University Press, 1976), p. 54. The political philosopher Michael Walzer clearly acknowledges this tendency in Just and Unjust Wars, although he is determined to combat it, since his aim is to put limits on war and not engage in crusades. Walzer, Just and Unjust Wars: A Moral Argument with Historical Illustrations (New York: Basic Books, 2007), chap. 7.

17.关于三十年战争，参见杰弗里·帕克主编，《三十年战争》，第二版（纽约：劳特利奇出版社，1998年）；C·V·韦奇伍德，《三十年战争》（伦敦：乔纳森·凯普出版社，1938年）；彼得·H·威尔逊，《三十年战争：欧洲的悲剧》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，2011年）。关于《威斯特伐利亚和约》对开启主权时代的重要性，参见利奥·格罗斯，《威斯特伐利亚和约，1648-1948》，《美国国际法杂志》第42卷第1期（1948年1月）：20-41页。然而，一些学者对格罗斯的解释提出质疑。参见安德烈亚斯·奥西安德，《主权、国际关系与威斯特伐利亚神话》，《国际组织》第55卷第1期（1948年1月）：1999-1999页。 2（2001年4月）：251-87；德里克·克罗克斯顿，《1648年威斯特伐利亚和约与主权的起源》，《国际历史评论》 21卷3期（1999年9月）：569-91。我同意丹尼尔·菲尔波特的观点：“威斯特伐利亚和约标志着现代体系的巩固，而非凭空创造。它并非一蹴而就的蜕变，因为主权国家的基本要素实际上已经积累了三个世纪。”丹尼尔·菲尔波特，《现代国际关系的宗教根源》，《世界政治》 52卷2期（2000年1月）：209。

17. On the Thirty Years’ War, see Geoffrey Parker, ed., The Thirty Years’ War, 2nd ed. (New York: Routledge, 1998); C. V. Wedgwood, The Thirty Years War (London: Jonathan Cape, 1938); Peter H. Wilson, The Thirty Years War: Europe’s Tragedy (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 2011). Regarding the importance of the Treaty of Westphalia for beginning the age of sovereignty, see Leo Gross, “The Peace of Westphalia, 1648–1948,” American Journal of International Law 42, no. 1 (January 1948): 20–41. Some scholars, however, challenge Gross’s interpretation. See Andreas Osiander, “Sovereignty, International Relations, and the Westphalian Myth,” International Organization 55, no. 2 (April 2001): 251–87; Derek Croxton, “The Peace of Westphalia of 1648 and the Origins of Sovereignty,” International History Review 21, no. 3 (September 1999): 569–91. I agree with Daniel Philpott’s assessment “that Westphalia signals the consolidation, not the creation ex nihilo, of the modern system. It was not an instant metamorphosis, as elements of sovereign statehood had indeed been accumulating for three centuries.” Daniel Philpott, “The Religious Roots of Modern International Relations,” World Politics 52, no. 2 (January 2000): 209.

Crawford, however, emphasizes that the changing interests and capabilities of the imperial powers as well as the local populations also helped determine the final outcome.

25.有人可能会认为，自由主义与主权之间的这种紧张关系最终会消失，因为一旦世界完全由自由民主国家组成，它们之间就没有必要干涉彼此的内政。毕竟，自由民主国家并非严重侵犯人权的国家，它们之间也不会发生战争。因此，主权将再次受到尊崇，因为自由主义原则与威斯特伐利亚体系下的主权之间将不再存在冲突。然而，这种结果的前提是，像英国和美国这样的国家能够成功地将自由民主传播到世界各地，有时甚至不惜诉诸武力。但这种假设是错误的，因为在其他国家进行社会改造往往以失败告终，有时甚至会造成灾难性的后果，正如布什主义的案例所示。

25. One might argue that this tension between liberalism and sovereignty will eventually disappear, because once the world is populated solely with liberal democracies, there will be no need for them to intervene in each other’s domestic affairs. After all, liberal democracies are not serious human rights violators, and they do not fight wars against each other. Thus, sovereignty would once again be venerated, since there would be no conflict between liberal principles and Westphalian sovereignty. This outcome, however, assumes that countries like Britain and the United States can successfully spread liberal democracy across the globe, sometimes at the end of a rifle barrel. But this assumption is wrong, as doing social engineering in foreign countries ends up failing more often than not, sometimes disastrously, as was the case with the Bush Doctrine.

33.截至2014年，美国已承诺向阿富汗重建投入1090亿美元。杜鲁门政府向马歇尔计划承诺投入1034亿美元（经通货膨胀调整）。在阿富汗的1090亿美元中，有620亿美元用于加强其安全部队建设。阿富汗重建特别监察长，《提交美国国会的季度报告》，2014年7月30日，https://www.sigar.mil/pdf/quarterlyreports/2014-07-30qr.pdf。截至2016年底，美国已在阿富汗重建方面投入1170亿美元。阿富汗重建特别监察长，《提交美国国会的季度报告》，2017年1月30日，https://www.sigar.mil/pdf/quarterlyreports/2017-01-30qr.pdf。该报告引用了一项研究，该研究估计，在阿富汗和伊拉克冲突中，“至少有 300 亿美元，甚至可能高达 600 亿美元因合同浪费和欺诈而损失”。

33. As of 2014, the United States had committed $109 billion to the reconstruction of Afghanistan. The Truman administration committed $103.4 billion (adjusted for inflation) to the Marshall Plan. Of that $109 billion spent in Afghanistan, $62 billion was used to build up its security forces. Special Inspector General for Afghanistan Reconstruction, Quarterly Report to the United States Congress, July 30, 2014, https://www.sigar.mil/pdf/quarterlyreports/2014-07-30qr.pdf. By the end of 2016, the United States had spent $117 billion on reconstruction in Afghanistan. 52.美国及其欧洲盟友有时会吹捧波斯尼亚干预行动的成功。虽然西方在1995年制止了波斯尼亚的血腥冲突这一点毋庸置疑，但波斯尼亚如今并非一个独立国家，因为主要由欧盟和美国创建的高级代表办公室在治理该国方面发挥着核心作用。此外，即便波斯尼亚独立，它也不符合民主国家的标准，这主要是因为其宪法违反了《欧洲人权公约》。最后，欧盟在波斯尼亚保持着军事存在，以防止敌对派别再次开战。

52. The United States and its European allies sometimes tout Bosnia as a successful intervention. While there is no question the West brought the bloody conflict in Bosnia to a halt in 1995, it is not an independent country today, because the Office of the High Representative, a creation largely of the EU and the United States, plays a central role in governing it. Moreover, even if Bosnia were independent, it would not qualify as a democracy, in large part because its constitution violates the European Convention on Human Rights. Finally, the EU maintains a military presence in Bosnia to keep the rival factions from starting their war anew.

54.这是危机爆发后一些分析人士提出的论点，但在危机爆发前几乎无人提出。例如，斯蒂芬·塞斯塔诺维奇声称，“如今咄咄逼人的对俄政策”早在20世纪90年代初就已形成，“从那时起，实力考量就成为”美国对俄政策的基石。斯蒂芬·塞斯塔诺维奇，《西方如何取胜》，《外交事务》93卷6期（2014年11/12月）：171、173页。在这种观点看来，北约扩张是一种现实主义政策。然而，现有证据与这种对事件的解读相悖。俄罗斯在20世纪90年代根本没有能力发动进攻，尽管其经济和军事实力在2000年后有所改善，但几乎没有人……在2月22日政变之前，西方普遍认为俄罗斯入侵邻国（尤其是乌克兰）构成严重威胁。事实上，俄罗斯在其西部边境及其附近几乎没有大规模作战部队，也没有任何一位重要的俄罗斯决策者或评论员谈及征服东欧领土。因此，美国领导人很少援引俄罗斯侵略威胁来为北约扩张辩护也就不足为奇了。

54. This is an argument that some analysts made after the crisis broke out, but hardly anyone made before the crisis began. Stephen Sestanovich, for example, claims that “today’s aggressive Russian policy was in place” in the early 1990s and “power calculations undergirded” American policy toward Russia from that point forward. Stephen Sestanovich, “How the West Has Won,” Foreign Affairs 93, no. 6 (November/December 2014): 171, 173. NATO enlargement, in this view, is a realist policy. The available evidence, however, contradicts this interpretation of events. Russia was in no position to take the offensive in the 1990s, and although its economy and military improved somewhat after 2000, hardly anyone in the West saw it as a serious threat to invade its neighbors—especially Ukraine—before the February 22 coup. In fact, Russia had hardly any large-scale combat units on or near its western border, and no serious Russian policymaker or pundit talked about conquering territory in eastern Europe. Thus, it is unsurprising that U.S. leaders rarely invoked the threat of Russian aggression to justify NATO expansion.

63.欧盟在2013年力促乌克兰签署的联系国协定并非仅涉及经济事务，它还包含重要的安全层面。具体而言，该协定呼吁各方“促进在外交和安全事务上逐步趋同，以期乌克兰更深入地参与欧洲安全领域”。协定还呼吁“充分利用各方之间的所有外交和军事渠道，包括在第三国以及联合国、欧安组织（欧洲安全与合作组织）和其他国际论坛内进行适当接触”。这听起来无疑是加入北约的后门，任何一位谨慎的俄罗斯领导人都不会作其他解读。有关背景信息和乌克兰总统于2014年3月21日和2014年6月27日部分签署的《联系协定》副本，请参见“欧盟对外行动署2015年4月27日发布的《欧盟-乌克兰联系协定概览》，网址：http://collections.internetmemory.org/haeu/content/20160313172652/http ://eeas.europa.eu/top_stories/2012/140912_ukraine_en.htm”。以上引文出自该协定第二章第四条第一款和第二章第五条第三款b项。

63. The Association Agreement the EU was pushing Ukraine to sign in 2013 did not deal just with economic matters. It also had an important security dimension. Specifically, it called for all parties to “promote gradual convergence on foreign and security matters with the aim of Ukraine’s ever deeper involvement in the European security area.” It also called for “taking full and timely advantage of all diplomatic and military channels between the Parties, including appropriate contacts in third countries and within the United Nations, the OSCE [Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe] and other international fora.” This certainly sounds like a back door to NATO membership, and no prudent Russian leader would interpret it any other way. For background information and a copy of the Association Agreement, which the Ukrainian president signed in parts on March 21, 2014, and June 27, 2014, see “A Look at the EU-Ukraine Association Agreement,” European Union External Action, April 27, 2015, http://collections.internetmemory.org/haeu/content/20160313172652/http://eeas.europa.eu/top_stories/2012/140912_ukraine_en.htm. The above quotes are from Title II, Article 4, 1; Title II, Article 5, 3b.

64.美国负责欧洲事务的助理国务卿维多利亚·纽兰 (Victoria Nuland) 在 2013 年 12 月估计，自 1991 年以来，美国已投资超过 50 亿美元，帮助乌克兰实现“其应有的未来”。纽兰，“在美乌基金会会议上的讲话”，华盛顿特区，2013 年 12 月 13 日，https://www.youtube.com/watch? x-yt-ts=1422411861&v=2y0y-JUsPTU&x-yt-cl=84924572。牵头这项工作的关键组织是国家民主基金会 (NED)，这是一个由美国政府大量资助的私人非营利基金会。罗伯特·帕里 (Robert Parry)，“美国的影子外交政策”，《联盟新闻》，2014 年 2 月 27 日；罗伯特·帕里，《中央情报局在“民主”团体中的幕后操纵》，《联盟新闻》，2015年1月10日。美国国家民主基金会（NED）资助了60多个旨在促进乌克兰公民社会发展的项目，其主席卡尔·格什曼认为这是该组织“最大的奖赏”。格什曼，《前苏联国家挺身对抗俄罗斯》；威廉·布鲁姆，《美国对乌克兰的政策：如此巨大的虚伪令人震惊》，《外交政策杂志》，2014年3月8日。关于NED资助的项目，参见美国国家民主基金会，《乌克兰2014》，http://www.ned.org/region/central-and-eastern-europe/ukraine-2014/。2010年2月维克托·亚努科维奇赢得乌克兰总统选举后，NED认为他正在破坏乌克兰的民主进程。因此，美国国家民主基金会开始支持反对亚努科维奇的势力，并致力于加强乌克兰的民主制度。

70.北约扩张几乎没有遇到阻力的原因之一是，自由主义者认为北约永远不必履行其新的安全保证，因为国际政治的本质，至少在欧洲，已经发生了根本性的变化。战争已从欧洲消失。值得注意的是，美国及其欧洲盟友并不将乌克兰视为核心战略利益，他们不愿动用武力援助乌克兰应对当前的危机就证明了这一点。从现实主义的角度来看，如果北约成员国无意保卫乌克兰，那么将乌克兰纳入北约将是极其愚蠢的。然而，自由主义者认为，鉴于他们对当今世界运作方式的理解，没有必要担心保卫乌克兰的问题。因此，他们愿意向一个他们最终不愿保卫的国家提供安全保证。

70. One reason there was so little resistance to NATO expansion is that liberals assumed the alliance would never have to honor its new security guarantees, because the nature of international politics, at least in Europe, had fundamentally changed. War has been burned out of Europe. It is worth noting that the United States and its European allies do not consider Ukraine to be a core strategic interest, as their unwillingness to use military force to come to its aid in the ongoing crisis shows. From a realist perspective, it would be the height of folly to bring Ukraine into NATO when the alliance’s members have no intention of defending it. Liberals, however, thought there was no need to worry about defending Ukraine, given their understanding of how the contemporary world works. So they were willing to give a security guarantee to a country that they were ultimately unwilling to defend.

95.这并非否认，无论是在两极格局还是多极格局下，大国之间的竞争都迫使它们在和平时期乃至战争时期几乎别无选择，只能维持庞大的军事力量，而这可能对公民自由构成威胁。然而，在单极格局下，单一的大国可以选择缩减军力规模，避免发动战争，仅仅因为其实力强大。在这种情况下，该单一极点的对外政策不会对国内的自由主义构成威胁。另一方面，自由主义霸权则必然导致单极格局最终建立起庞大的军事机构，并沉迷于战争。

95. This is not to deny that competition among the great powers in either bipolarity or multipolarity leaves them little choice but to retain large military forces in peacetime and certainly in wartime, which can pose a threat to civil liberties. In unipolarity, however, the single great power has the option of reducing the size of its military and refraining from fighting wars, simply because it is so powerful. In that event, the sole pole’s foreign policy would not threaten liberalism at home. Liberal hegemony, on the other hand, guarantees that the unipole will end up building a huge military establishment and hooked on war.

96.本段及接下来两段中的所有引文均出自 James C. Scott 的《像国家一样看待：某些改善人类状况的计划是如何失败的》（康涅狄格州纽黑文：耶鲁大学出版社，1998 年），第 4-5 页。

96. All the quotes in this paragraph and the next two are from James C. Scott, Seeing Like a State: How Certain Schemes to Improve the Human Condition Have Failed (New Haven, CT: Yale University Press, 1998), pp. 4–5.

97.另见约翰·格雷的《黑色弥撒：末世宗教与乌托邦的消亡》（纽约：法勒、斯特劳斯和吉鲁出版社，2007 年），他没有引用斯科特，但提出了与我类似的论点。

97. Also see John Gray, Black Mass: Apocalyptic Religion and the Death of Utopia (New York: Farrar, Straus and Giroux, 2007), who does not reference Scott but makes an argument similar to mine.
