11.关于德国为何符合自由民主国家的标准，可参阅克里斯托弗·莱恩（Christopher Layne）的《空壳游戏、浅薄的收益与民主和平》（“Shell Games, Shallow Gains, and the Democratic Peace”），载于《国际历史评论》（International History Review ）第23卷第4期（2001年12月），第803-807页。另见伊多·奥伦（Ido Oren）的《“民主”和平的主观性：美国对德意志帝国的看法变迁》（“The Subjectivity of the 'Democratic' Peace: Changing US Perceptions of Imperial Germany”），载于《国际安全》（International Security）第20卷第2期（1995年秋季），第147-184页。1900年，英国有18%的人口拥有下议院选举权，而德国的这一比例为22%。尼尔·弗格森（Niall Ferguson）著，《战争的悲哀：解释第一次世界大战》（Pity of War: Explaining World War I）（纽约：基础书籍出版社，1999年），第29页。就连迈克尔·道尔（Michael Doyle）也承认“德意志帝国是一个棘手的案例”。道尔，《康德、自由主义遗产与外交事务》（“Kant, Liberal Legacies, and Foreign Affairs”），第一部分，第101-111页。 216.

12.民主和平理论家们排除了这种情况，要么是因为他们认为这两个南非邦国对英国的独立性不够强，要么是因为南非共和国不够民主。但他们的这两个观点都是错误的。这两个邦国都已明确确立了独立地位，即便英国不愿给予它们完全主权；而且，尽管南非共和国确实将某些群体排除在投票之外，但当时几乎所有其他民主国家也都采取了同样的做法。

12. Democratic peace theorists rule this case out, either because they believe these two South African states were not sufficiently independent of Britain or because the South African Republic was not democratic enough. But they are wrong on both counts. Both states had clearly established their independence, even if Britain did not want to grant them full sovereignty, and although the South African Republic did exclude certain groups from voting, so did virtually every other democracy at the time.

13.卡吉尔战争是一个无可争议的案例。美西战争则是一个存在争议的案例；莱恩解释了为什么应该将其视为两个民主国家相互交战的案例。莱恩，《空壳游戏》，第802页。

14.例如，詹姆斯·L·雷考察了20个据称是民主国家之间交战的案例。参见詹姆斯·L·雷，《民主与国际冲突：民主和平命题的评估》（哥伦比亚：南卡罗来纳大学出版社，2009年），第3章。另见拉塞特，《把握民主和平》，第16-23页；斯宾塞·R·韦尔特，《永不交战：民主国家为何不会彼此交战》（纽黑文，康涅狄格州：耶鲁大学出版社，1998年）。一个国家是否被认为是民主国家，取决于人们如何定义民主，而民主的定义有时会受到观察者偏见的影响。萨拉·S·布什，“自由评级的政治：意识形态亲和力、私人权威与世界自由评级”，《政治视角》 15卷3期（2017年9月）：711-731页； Oren，“‘民主’和平的主观性”。

Also see Russett, Grasping the Democratic Peace, pp. 16–23; Spencer R. Weart, Never at War: Why Democracies Will Not Fight One Another (New Haven, CT: Yale University Press, 1998). Whether a state is an “alleged” democracy depends on how one defines democracy, which is sometimes subject to the bias of the observer. Sarah S. Bush, “The Politics of Rating Freedom: Ideological Affinity, Private Authority, and the Freedom in the World Ratings,” Perspectives on Politics 15, no. 3 (September 2017): 711–31; Oren, “The Subjectivity of the ‘Democratic’ Peace.”

15.军事化冲突是指一国对另一国使用武力威胁、展示或使用武力，但未达到战争（一千人以上阵亡）的程度。布鲁斯·鲁塞特认为，尽管民主国家之间确实会发生军事化冲突，但这种情况发生的频率远低于至少一方为非民主国家的情况。参见鲁塞特，《把握民主和平》，第20-21页，72-93页。他的观点或许正确，但关键在于，即使这些冲突的伤亡程度不足以构成战争，它们之间仍然会发生冲突。

15. A militarized conflict is where the threat, display, or use of military force short of war (one thousand battle deaths) is employed by one state against another. Bruce Russett maintains that although democratic states do engage in militarized conflicts with each other, they do so less often than is the case when at least one of the disputants is a non-democracy. Russett, Grasping the Democratic Peace, pp. 20–21, 72–93. He may be right, but the point is they do fight with each other, even if those conflicts are not deadly enough to qualify as a war.

16.雷，《民主与国际冲突》，第42页。不出所料，雷试图驳斥所有可能被视为民主国家之间相互交战的案例。因此，他在关于这些案例的关键章节中总结道：“持怀疑态度的读者，或者甚至是对此漠不关心的读者，到此可能会得出结论：如此之多的例外情况，显然与‘民主国家之间从不进行国际战争’这一论断相悖，这本身就削弱了该论断的可信度。‘无风不起浪’这样的反应是可以理解的”（第124页）。

16. Ray, Democracy and International Conflict, p. 42. Not surprisingly, Ray attempts to knock down every case that might be seen as an example of democracies fighting against each other. Thus, he concludes his key chapter on those cases: “Skeptical, or perhaps even simply disinterested readers may conclude, by this point, that the sheer number of ostensible exceptions to the proposition that democratic states never fight international wars against each other undermines its credibility. ‘Where there is so much smoke, there must be at least a little fire’ would be an understandable reaction” (p. 124).

A Cautionary Tale (Hanover, NH: University Press of New England, 1985), pp. 4, 10. Chinese nationalism helped push Chiang Kai-shek and his lieutenants to declare war against Japan in 1937, even though they thought doing so was not in China’s best interest. See James M. Bertram, Crisis in China: The Story of the Sian Mutiny (London: Macmillan, 1937), pp. 117–23, 127–29; John Israel, Student Nationalism in China, 1927–1937 (Stanford, CA: Stanford University Press, 1966), pp. 170–71. Austin Carson shows that warring states sometimes subtly work together to hide facets of the ongoing war from their publics, for fear that the citizenry finding out about them would fuel nationalist sentiment that would lead to unwanted escalation. Carson, “Facing Off and Saving Face: Covert Intervention and Escalation Management in the Korean War,” International Organization 71, no. 1 (January 2016): 103–31. 24.我已经讨论了民主和平的三种主要制度性解释。塞巴斯蒂安·罗萨托指出了另外三种值得一提的解释，尽管它们都无法提供令人信服的因果关系。首先，人们认为民主领导人比威权领导人更加谨慎，因为前者对公众负有更大的责任，因此一旦战败，他们将付出更大的代价。罗萨托引用海因·戈曼斯等人的研究指出，无论领导人是民主国家还是威权国家，当他们带领国家卷入一场必败的战争时，所付出的代价大致相同。其次，反战利益集团会给一心想发动战争的民主领导人设置重重障碍。然而，几乎没有证据表明，在自由民主国家中，反战团体比支持战争的团体更有可能影响决策者。此外，独裁者有强大的动机不发动战争，因为他们通常只代表一小部分民众，而战争通常会释放出其他民众（如果不是大多数民众）的力量，这些力量可能会威胁到独裁者的统治。第三，有人认为民主国家由于决策过程过于透明，因此无法发动突袭。正如罗萨托所指出的，1956年的苏伊士运河战争表明这种说法并不成立：三个民主国家（英国、法国和以色列）策划了对埃及的协同攻击，不仅令埃及人措手不及，也令美国感到意外。此外，大多数战争并非由突袭引发。参见塞巴斯蒂安·罗萨托，《民主和平理论的逻辑缺陷》，《美国政治科学评论》 97卷4期（2003年11月）：585-602页。

24. I have discussed the three main institutional explanations for the democratic peace. Sebastian Rosato points out three others that bear mentioning, although none provides a compelling causal story. First, democratic leaders are said to be more cautious than authoritarian leaders, because the former are more accountable to their publics and thus suffer greater costs if they lose a war. Using the work of Hein Goemans and others, Rosato shows that leaders of both kinds pay roughly the same price when they take their country into a losing war. Second, anti-war interest groups throw significant hurdles in the path of democratic leaders bent on war. There is little evidence, however, that anti-war groups are more likely to influence policymakers in a liberal democracy than pro-war groups. Plus, autocrats have powerful incentives not to start wars, because they normally represent a narrow slice of the population and going to war usually unleashes forces that empower other slices of the population, if not most of the population, all of which is likely to threaten the autocrat’s rule. Third, democracies are said to be incapable of launching surprise attacks because their decision-making process is so transparent. As Rosato notes, the 1956 Suez War shows this is not true: three democracies (Britain, France, and Israel) planned a coordinated attack on Egypt that surprised not only the Egyptians but the United States as well. Moreover, most wars are not initiated with a surprise attack. Sebastian Rosato, “The Flawed Logic of Democratic Peace Theory,” American Political Science Review 97, no. 4 (November 2003): 585–602.

55. “少一枚钉子”这个短语出自著名的“莱茵兰寓言”，这则寓言通常被认为是本杰明·富兰克林所作：

55. The phrase “want of a nail” comes from the famous “Rhineland Parable,” which is usually attributed to Benjamin Franklin:

因为少了一颗钉子，鞋子丢了。

For the want of a nail the shoe was lost

因为少了一只马蹄铁，马儿走失了。

For the want of a shoe the horse was lost

由于没有马，骑手失踪了。

For the want of a horse the rider was lost

由于缺少一名骑兵，这场战斗失败了。

For the want of a rider the battle was lost

由于缺乏一场战役，王国沦陷了。

For the want of a battle the kingdom was lost

而这一切，仅仅是因为缺少一枚马蹄钉。

And all for the want of a horseshoe-nail

举例来说，有人可能会认为，英国和法国本应在希特勒1936年重新武装莱茵兰时就直接与其对抗，而不是等到1939年才就波兰问题与其对抗。毕竟，1939年的德意志国防军比1936年强大得多。这个例子表明，“因小失大”的逻辑同样适用于“重大紧急情况”。与其等到陷入困境才采取行动，一个国家在潜在的危险敌人构成生存威胁之前就应该着手解决它。

To give an example, one could argue that Britain and France should have directly confronted Hitler when he remilitarized the Rhineland in 1936, rather than waiting until 1939 to confront him over Poland. After all, the Wehrmacht was a much more formidable fighting force in 1939 than it was in 1936. This example points up that “want of a nail” logic applies to cases involving “supreme emergencies.” Rather than waiting until it finds itself in dire straits, it makes sense for a state to deal with a potentially dangerous foe before it becomes an existential threat.

56. Dale C. Copeland，“建构主义对结构现实主义的挑战：一篇评论文章”，《国际安全》 25，第2期（2000年秋季）：187-212；Copeland，《经济相互依存与战争》，第39-42页；Copeland，《重大战争的起源》，第15、22、29页；Dale C. Copeland，“国际政治的理性主义理论与未来问题”，《安全研究》 20，第3期（2011年7月-9月）：441-450。

56. Dale C. Copeland, “The Constructivist Challenge to Structural Realism: A Review Essay,” International Security 25, no. 2 (Fall 2000): 187–212; Copeland, Economic Interdependence and War, pp. 39–42; Copeland, The Origins of Major War, pp. 15, 22, 29; Dale C. Copeland, “Rationalist Theories of International Politics and the Problem of the Future,” Security Studies 20, no. 3 (July–September 2011): 441–50.

57. “未雨绸缪”的逻辑与“因缺一不可”的逻辑不同。“未雨绸缪”的逻辑认为，目前没有证据表明某个国家构成威胁，但它未来总有可能成为威胁。“因缺一不可”的逻辑则认为，那个国家构成威胁，但尚未构成生存威胁。然而，它未来仍有可能发展成为致命威胁。这种逻辑是预防性战争的理论基础。

57. “Rainy day” logic is different from “want of a nail” logic. With rainy day logic, there is no evidence that a particular country is a threat at the moment, but there is always a possibility it might become one in the future. With “want of a nail” logic, that other country is a threat, but not yet an existential threat. There is some chance, however, it will become a mortal threat. This logic underpins preventive war.

第八章 克制的理由

Chapter 8. The Case for Restraint

1.约翰·罗尔斯和迈克尔·沃尔泽等学者意识到自由主义理论中蕴含的十字军东征式冲动，并竭力反对以武力来改善世界。参见迈克尔·沃尔泽，《正义与非正义的战争：以历史例证论证的道德论证》（纽约：基础出版社，2007）；约翰·罗尔斯，《万民法：附“公共理性观念再探”》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1999）。对沃尔泽观点的探讨表明，发动战争以在世界范围内传播自由民主与正义战争理论相悖。正义战争理论认为，除非在极其严格的限制条件下，否则进攻性战争都是不合法的，而促进民主并不属于这些限制条件。然而，在实践中，强大的自由民主国家尤其难以抵制以改善世界为目的而使用武力的冲动。

1. Scholars such as John Rawls and Michael Walzer are aware of the crusading impulse built into liberal theory, and go to considerable lengths to argue against using force to make the world a better place. See Michael Walzer, Just and Unjust Wars: A Moral Argument with Historical Illustrations (New York: Basic Books, 2007); John Rawls, The Law of Peoples: With “The Idea of Public Reason Revisited” (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1999). This discussion of Walzer’s views points up that initiating wars to spread liberal democracy around the world is at odds with just war theory, which is concerned with ruling offensive wars out of bounds except under highly restrictive circumstances, which do not include democracy promotion. In practice, however, it is especially difficult for powerful liberal democracies to resist the compulsion to use force for purposes of making the world a better place.

2. E.H. Carr，《二十年危机：国际关系研究导论》，第2版（伦敦：麦克米伦出版社，1962年）；罗伯特·吉尔平，“没人喜欢政治现实主义者”，《安全研究》 5，第3期（1996年春季）：3-26；约翰·J. Mearsheimer，“EH Carr vs. 理想主义：战斗仍在继续”，《国际关系》 19，第 2 期（2005 年 6 月）：139–52；Mearsheimer，“道德主义越好”，《国际关系》19，第 3 期（2005 年 9 月）：354–59。

(London: Macmillan, 1962); Robert Gilpin, “Nobody Loves a Political Realist,” Security Studies 5, no. 3 (Spring 1996): 3–26; John J. Mearsheimer, “E.H. Carr vs. Idealism: The Battle Rages On,” International Relations 19, no. 2 (June 2005): 139–52; Mearsheimer, “The Mores Isms the Better,” International Relations 19, no. 3 (September 2005): 354–59.

4. Charles L. Glaser，“现实主义者作为乐观主义者：合作作为自助”，《国际安全》 19，第 3 期（1994/95 年冬季）：50-90。另见 Charles L. Glaser，《国际政治的理性理论：竞争与合作的逻辑》（新泽西州普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，2010 年）。

4. Charles L. Glaser, “Realists as Optimists: Cooperation as Self-Help,” International Security 19, no. 3 (Winter 1994/95): 50–90. Also see Charles L. Glaser, Rational Theory of International Politics: The Logic of Competition and Cooperation (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2010).

Jack Snyder, Myths of Empire: Domestic Politics and International Ambition (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 1993); Stephen Van Evera, Causes of War: Power and the Roots of Conflict (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 1999); Kenneth N. 7.本段引文出自 Marc Trachtenberg，“现实主义问题：一位历史学家的观点”，《安全研究》 13，第 1 期（2003 年秋季）：159–60、167、194。另见 Michael C. Desch，“残酷的仁慈：美国现实主义的人性”，《国际研究评论》 29，第 3 期（2003 年 7 月）：415–26。

7. The quotes in this paragraph are from Marc Trachtenberg, “The Question of Realism: An Historian’s View,” Security Studies 13, no. 1 (Fall 2003): 159–60, 167, 194. Also see Michael C. Desch, “It’s Kind to Be Cruel: The Humanity of American Realism,” Review of International Studies 29, no. 3 (July 2003): 415–26.

8. Stephen M. Walt，“美国大战略：有限遏制的理由”，《国际安全》 14卷1期（1989年夏季）：5-49；Stephen Van Evera，“为何欧洲重要，为何第三世界不重要：冷战后美国的大战略”，《战略研究杂志》 13卷2期（1990年6月）：1-51。然而，一些小国对美国至关重要，因为它们位于具有重要战略意义的地区。古巴（西半球）、伊朗（波斯湾）和韩国（东北亚）就是三个突出的例子。

8. Stephen M. Walt, “U.S. Grand Strategy: The Case for Finite Containment,” International Security 14, no. 1 (Summer 1989): 5–49; Stephen Van Evera, “Why Europe Matters, Why the Third World Doesn’t: America’s Grand Strategy after the Cold War,” Journal of Strategic Studies 13, no. 2 (June 1990): 1–51. Nevertheless, some minor powers matter greatly to the United States because they are located in strategically important regions. Cuba (Western Hemisphere), Iran (Persian Gulf), and South Korea (Northeast Asia) are three prominent examples.

9.越南位于东南亚，而东南亚在冷战时期并非战略要地。20世纪，美国关注的亚洲两大强国是日本和俄罗斯。这两个国家都位于东北亚，因此，人们通常认为东北亚而非东南亚对美国具有战略意义。中国虽然在过去几个世纪并非强国，但如今正在迅速崛起，其地理位置既位于东北亚也位于东南亚。因此，如今更恰当的说法是，东亚而非东北亚才是美国关注的三大战略要地之一。

9. Vietnam is located in Southeast Asia, which was not a strategically important region during the Cold War. The two great powers in Asia that concerned the United States over the course of the twentieth century were Japan and Russia. Both of them are squarely located in Northeast Asia, which is why it was commonplace to describe that region, but not Southeast Asia, as strategically important to the United States. China, which was not a great power for centuries but is now rising rapidly, is located in Northeast as well as Southeast Asia. Thus, it is appropriate today to say that East Asia, not Northeast Asia, is one of the three key strategic regions of the world for the United States.

10.例如，克劳塞维茨写道：“战争是偶然的领域。没有任何其他人类活动能赋予它如此大的范围：没有任何其他活动像战争那样，需要如此频繁且多样地应对这种入侵者。偶然性使一切都更加不确定，并干扰了整个事件的进程。” 他在另一处写道：“战争是不确定性的领域；战争行动所依据的因素中，有四分之三都笼罩在或多或少的不确定性的迷雾之中。” 卡尔·冯·克劳塞维茨，《战争论》，迈克尔·霍华德和彼得·帕雷特编译（新泽西州普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，1976年），第101页。另见第85页。

10. Clausewitz writes, for example, “War is the realm of chance. No other human activity gives it greater scope: no other has such incessant and varied dealings with this intruder. Chance makes everything more uncertain and interferes with the whole course of events.” At another point, he says: “War is the realm of uncertainty; three quarters of the factors on which action in war is based are wrapped in a fog of greater or lesser uncertainty.” Carl von Clausewitz, On War, ed. and trans. Michael Howard and Peter Paret (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1976), p. 101. Also see p. 85.

11.虽然现实主义者承认非预期后果在国际政治中扮演着重要角色，但这种观点并非源于现实主义理论。如前所述，它主要来自对国际政治冲突方面的研究。

11. Although realists appreciate that unintended consequences play an important role in international politics, this belief is not derived from realist theory. As noted, it comes largely from studying the conflictual side of international politics.

12. Rosato 和 Schuessler 在《美国的现实主义外交政策》一书中强调了这一主题。

12. This theme is emphasized in Rosato and Schuessler, “A Realist Foreign Policy for the United States.”

Does it Matter?,” International Security 12, no. 2 (Fall 1987): 105–34; Jerome Slater, “The Domino Theory and International Politics: The Case of Vietnam,” Security Studies 3, no. 2 (Winter 1993/94): 186–224; Van Evera, Causes of War, chap. 5.

15.例如，想想美国在朝鲜战争（1950-1953）和越南战争（1965-1972）中给其对手造成的死亡和破坏。尽管对于确切的数字鲜有共识，但可以合理地假设，美军杀害了约一百万朝鲜平民和士兵、约四十万中国士兵以及约一百万越南平民和士兵。正如康拉德·克莱恩所指出的，“大多数作者估计，在朝鲜战争期间，双方都有超过一百万平民丧生”。参见康拉德·C·克莱恩，《美国在朝鲜的空军战略，1950-1953 》 （劳伦斯：堪萨斯大学出版社，2000年），第8页。另见冈特·莱维，《美国在越南》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，1978年），第450页。约翰·蒂尔曼，《他人的死亡：美国战争中平民的命运》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2011年），第92页。由于数十万朝鲜士兵在战斗中丧生，因此保守估计，死于美军之手的朝鲜人总数为一百万。关于美国对朝鲜发动战争的残酷程度，参见克莱恩，《美国在朝鲜的空军战略》；罗伯特·A·佩普，《轰炸取胜：战争中的空中力量与胁迫》（纽约州伊萨卡：康奈尔大学出版社，1996年），第五章。中国士兵的战斗死亡人数来自迈克尔·克洛德费尔特，《战争及其他冲突：伤亡及其他数据统计百科全书，1494-2007》，第三版（北卡罗来纳州杰斐逊：麦克法兰出版社，2008年）；蒂尔曼，《他人的死亡》，第92页。 92. 关于越南战争，“大多数权威人士的普遍观点”是“近一百万共产党战斗人员丧生，此外还有二十五万南越士兵以及数量不明的南北越平民伤亡。”（查尔斯·赫希曼、塞缪尔·普雷斯顿和武孟利，《美国战争期间的越南伤亡：一项新的估计》，《人口与发展评论》 21卷4期（1995年12月）：783-784页）。这项研究估计，1965年至1975年间，越南所有地区与战争相关的死亡人数略高于一百万人。显然，并非所有死亡都是美军造成的。该研究还指出：越南政府估计战争死亡人数为310万（第807页）。冈特·莱维则认为死亡人数为130万，其中28%（36.5万人）估计为平民（莱维，《美国在越南》，第451-453页）。美军肯定杀害了相当数量的平民，因为美军奉行以火力为导向的军事战略，旨在对敌方造成巨大打击，使其濒临崩溃。约翰·E·穆勒，《在越南寻找“崩溃点”：一场致命冲突的统计数据》，《国际研究季刊》第24卷第4期（1980年12月）：第497-519页。莱维指出，五角大楼估计仅北越和越共军方的死亡人数就约为66万人（莱维，《美国在越南》，第450页）。另见蒂尔曼（Tirman）的《他人的死亡》（The Deaths of Others），第320-322页，其中提供了各种估算数据，表明有充分理由认为美军至少杀害了一百万越南人。关于冷战后美国在中东地区“持续不断”的战争，前中央情报局分析师、中东问题专家格雷厄姆·富勒（Graham Fuller）认为，“过去几十年美国对穆斯林世界的军事干预”导致“至少两百万穆斯林丧生”。富勒，《特朗普——误入欧洲真相》（Trump—Blundering into European Truths），格雷厄姆·E·富勒（博客），2017年6月5日，http://grahamefuller.com/trump-blundering-into-european-truths/。当然，美军并非直接造成所有这些死亡，尽管它确实造成了许多受害者的死亡，并且在发动和加剧这些战争中扮演了关键角色。

15. Consider, for example, the death and devastation that the United States inflicted on its adversaries in the Korean War (1950–53) and the Vietnam War (1965–72). Although there is little agreement on the exact numbers, it is reasonable to assume that the U.S. military killed about one million North Korean civilians and soldiers, roughly four hundred thousand Chinese soldiers, and about one million Vietnamese civilians and soldiers. As Conrad Crane notes, “Most authors estimate that more than a million civilians died on each side” during the Korean War. Conrad C. Crane, American Airpower Strategy in Korea, 1950–1953 (Lawrence: University Press of Kansas, 2000), p. 8. Also see Guenter Lewy, America in Vietnam (New York: Oxford University Press, 1978), p. 450; John Tirman, The Deaths of Others: The Fate of Civilians in America’s Wars (New York: Oxford University Press, 2011), p. 92. Since hundreds of thousands of North Korean soldiers died in combat, one million is a conservative estimate for the total number of North Koreans killed by American forces. Regarding the brutality with which the United States waged war against North Korea, see Crane, American Airpower Strategy in Korea; Robert A. Pape, Bombing to Win: Air Power and Coercion in War (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 1996), chap. 5. The number of Chinese battle deaths is from Michael Clodfelter, Warfare and Other Conflicts: A Statistical Encyclopedia of Casualty and Other Figures, 1494–2007, 3rd ed. (Jefferson, NC: McFarland, 2008); Tirman, The Deaths of Others, p. 92. On Vietnam, the “prevailing view of most knowledgeable authorities” is “that close to one million communist combatants lost their lives, in addition to a quarter-million South Vietnamese soldiers and an unknown number of civilian casualties in South and North Vietnam.” Charles Hirschman, Samuel Preston, and Vu Manh Loi, “Vietnamese Casualties during the American War: A New Estimate,” Population and Development Review 21, no. 4 (December 1995): 783–84. This study estimates that there were slightly more than a million war-related deaths in all of Vietnam between 1965 and 1975. U.S. forces obviously did not cause all of those deaths. The study also notes that the Vietnamese government estimates the number to be 3.1 million war deaths (p. 807). Guenter Lewy places the number at 1.3 million, 28 percent (365,000) of whom he estimates were civilians (Lewy, America in Vietnam, pp. 451–53). American forces surely killed a substantial number of those civilians, as the forces were pursuing a firepower-oriented military strategy aimed at inflicting massive punishment on their adversary, which would push it to the breaking point. John E. Mueller, “The Search for the ‘Breaking Point’ in Vietnam: The Statistics of a Deadly Quarrel,” International Studies Quarterly 24, no. 4 (December 1980): 497–519. Lewy notes that the Pentagon estimates that North Vietnamese and Viet Cong military deaths alone numbered about 660,000 (Lewy, America in Vietnam, p. 450). Also see Tirman, The Deaths of Others, pp. 320–22, which provides a variety of estimates that show there is good reason to think the U.S. military killed at least one million Vietnamese. Regarding America’s “non-stop” wars in the greater Middle East after the Cold War, former CIA analyst and Middle East expert Graham Fuller maintains that “American military intervention in the Muslim world over the past few decades” has resulted “in the killing of at least two million Muslims.” Fuller, “Trump—Blundering into European Truths,” Graham E. Fuller (blog), June 5, 2017, http://grahamefuller.com/trump-blundering-into-european-truths/. Of course, the U.S. military did not directly cause all those deaths, although it certainly killed many of the victims, and it played a key role in starting and fueling those wars.

27.一些主张克制的重要著作包括：安德鲁·J·巴塞维奇的《权力的局限：美国例外论的终结》（纽约：霍尔特出版社，2009年）；理查德·K·贝茨的《美国武力：国家安全中的危险、错觉和困境》（纽约：哥伦比亚大学出版社，2013年）；大卫·C·亨德里克森的《共和国的危机：美国帝国与自由主义传统》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2018年）；查尔默斯·约翰逊的《瓦解帝国：美国最后的希望》（纽约：大都会出版社，2010年）；克里斯托弗·莱恩的《幻觉的和平：1940年至今的美国大战略》（纽约州伊萨卡：康奈尔大学出版社，2007年）。阿纳托尔·利文和约翰·赫尔斯曼，《伦理现实主义：美国在世界上的角色愿景》（纽约：万神殿出版社，2006年）；迈克尔·林德，《美国式战略：美国外交政策与美国生活方式》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2006年）；沃尔特·A·麦克杜格尔，《应许之地，十字军国家：1776年以来美国与世界的相遇》（纽约：霍顿·米夫林出版社，1997年）；戴维·梅耶斯，《美国崛起中的异议之声》（纽约：剑桥大学出版社，2007年）；约翰·J·米尔斯海默和斯蒂芬·M·沃尔特，“离岸平衡的理由”，《外交事务》 95卷，第4期（2016年7/8月）：70-83页；拉詹·梅农，《人道主义干预的自负》（纽约：牛津大学出版社，2016年）。 Joseph M. Parent 和 Paul K. MacDonald，“收缩的智慧：美国必须削减开支才能前进”，《外交事务》 90，第 6 期（2011 年 11 月/12 月）：32–47；Barry R. Posen，《克制：美国大战略的新基础》（纽约州伊萨卡：康奈尔大学出版社，2015 年）；Christopher A. Preble，《权力问题：美国军事优势如何使我们更不安全、更不繁荣、更不自由》（纽约州伊萨卡：康奈尔大学出版社，2009 年）；Rosato 和 Schuessler，“美国的现实主义外交政策”，第 803–19 页；A. Trevor Thrall 和 Benjamin H. Friedman 编，《21 世纪的美国大战略：克制的理由》（纽约：Routledge 出版社，2018 年）。斯蒂芬·M·沃尔特，《驯服美国力量：全球对美国霸权的回应》（纽约：诺顿出版社，2005年）。值得注意的是，现实主义者并非唯一主张克制的群体；一些克制派人士从非现实主义视角看待外交政策。事实上，甚至一些自由国际主义者也赞成克制。例如，参见托尼·史密斯的《威尔逊为何重要：美国自由国际主义的起源及其当今的危机》。（新泽西州普林斯顿：普林斯顿大学出版社，2017 年）。

27. Some of the key works making the case for restraint include Andrew J. Bacevich, The Limits of Power: The End of American Exceptionalism (New York: Holt Paperbacks, 2009); Richard K. Betts, American Force: Dangers, Delusions, and Dilemmas in National Security (New York: Columbia University Press, 2013); David C. Hendrickson, Republic in Peril: American Empire and the Liberal Tradition (New York: Oxford University Press, 2018); Chalmers Johnson, Dismantling the Empire: America’s Last Best Hope (New York: Metropolitan Books, 2010); Christopher Layne, The Peace of Illusions: American Grand Strategy from 1940 to the Present (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 2007); Anatol Lieven and John Hulsman, Ethical Realism: A Vision for America’s Role in the World (New York: Pantheon, 2006); Michael Lind, The American Way of Strategy: U.S. Foreign Policy and the American Way of Life (New York: Oxford University Press, 2006); Walter A. McDougall, Promised Land, Crusader State: The American Encounter with the World since 1776 (New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1997); David Mayers, Dissenting Voices in America’s Rise to Power (New York: Cambridge University Press, 2007); John J. Mearsheimer and Stephen M. Walt, “The Case for Offshore Balancing,” Foreign Affairs 95, no. 4 (July/August 2016): 70–83; Rajan Menon, The Conceit of Humanitarian Intervention (New York: Oxford University Press, 2016); Joseph M. Parent and Paul K. MacDonald, “The Wisdom of Retrenchment: America Must Cut Back to Move Forward,” Foreign Affairs 90, no. 6 (November/December 2011): 32–47; Barry R. Posen, Restraint: A New Foundation for U.S. Grand Strategy (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 2015); Christopher A. Preble, The Power Problem: How American Military Dominance Makes Us Less Safe, Less Prosperous, and Less Free (Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 2009); Rosato and Schuessler, “A Realist Foreign Policy for the United States,” pp. 803–19; A. Trevor Thrall and Benjamin H. Friedman, eds., US Grand Strategy in the 21st Century: The Case for Restraint (New York: Routledge, 2018); Stephen M. Walt, Taming American Power: The Global Response to U.S. Primacy (New York: Norton, 2005). It is important to note that realists are not the only advocates of restraint; there are restrainers who approach foreign policy from non-realist perspectives. Indeed, there are even some liberal internationalists who favor restraint. See, for example, Tony Smith, Why Wilson Matters: The Origin of American Liberal Internationalism and Its Crisis Today (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 2017).
